27a7('dul ba): com pa na deng phog ma ga ni 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'byud do// sa sems bskyed cing tshig tu smras pa ste/ 'di ni rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mthar can zhes bya'o// sems gtong ba'i mtha'
27a8('dul ba): can gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas der theg mar go ni rje ba'i dran pa na nyi 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gni 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su
27b1('dul ba): ba dnge par za shig nges par zung shig ces bya ste/ 'di ni sems gtad pa'i mtha' can nas kyu'o// banyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgom pa dang pa gses pa ste// 'don banyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o// 
27b2('dul ba): gnas stong pa gang zhen/ spangs pa'i gnas te 'di ni gnas stong sa shes kya'o// bskos pa gang zhen/ gsal pa dang gnyis kyi las kyis bskos pa'o// dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bslob ma shes rnas
27b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dum gang dang bcas pa la dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o// bsko ba yang 'di
27b4('dul ba): bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong nams la yang dag par bsgol/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba
27b5('dul ba): byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsgon/ gal te
27b6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzed na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di dge 'dun
27b7('dul ba): rung ba'i kunas su bskod// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste dge 'dun btsun po rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang
27b8('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsgo bar bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi ros nye 'khor 'dos gang dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun ci
28a1('dul ba): gnas su bskon cidang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas thams cad lags pa nang mtshams dang phyi ro po nye 'khor 'dob gang dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsgob bcoM
28a2('dul ba): pa de dag ni cang pa gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bkyis lags pa nang mchims dang phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang
28a3('dul ba): bcas pa 'di dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos pa de gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyin
28a4('dul ba): du btsos pa dang / mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// yangs pa can na sde dpon seng
28a5('dul ba): zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis de'i ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas de yang za bar byed do// gang gi tshe des bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshem za bas khyer te
28a6('dul ba): 'dos nas yang dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do// dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag thos pa dang su stegs can rnams smod par byed/ gzhog/ 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ shes ldan da/ 
28a7('dul ba): dpon seng ge'i ched du byas te shA kyor te 'ongs dad de dag pa 'os la/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang shrIn+ya'i sgras kyi dge slong rnams kyi ched du byas pa'i na na thos so zhes pa
28a8('dul ba): skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i shazla pA mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa gsum
28b1('dul ba): bdes/ bdag shin du byas par 'a dus sa rgyab sa yin pa ga pa ra ba kye 'o zhes gsas pa dang / da ces las thong ci byas pa snyen nogs thos pa dang / rang N+Di hU~M sgrol rnam pa rton pa
28b2('dul ba): tshul las 'dini 'dag gi ched du byas pa yin sa pa rung bya ma yin pa'i gabar bar mi bya'ogs gsungs pa yin no// dge slong dgrangs gnas gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o / zhes gsungs pa gsum dang ni// 
28b3('dul ba): na 'dis bdag gi ched du byas par gnasum du ma mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las 'dis khyod kyi ched du byas pa ma len no zhes thos pa dang ba'i gabar bar bya'o zhes gsungs
28b4('dul ba): pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par rtog pa skyes pa rgyal las 'dren bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyas pa ma skyes b.rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mu ge dang
28b5('dul ba): 'i dus byung nas dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas de rnams glos phab ste 'dug pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa la ci'i
28b6('dul ba): sma du smos lab ste bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas bsod snyoms lto 'grangs par mi rnyed pas kho bo cag rtogs te nyam
28b7('dul ba): dbas des na glos phab ste 'dug go// de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci ste zhal tshus mi gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin
28b8('dul ba): 'i gnas de yod do zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal
29a1('dul ba): dkon pa 'di lta bung dge slong rnams kyis g.yar tshus par bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yodana'o// mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas dge slong
29a2('dul ba): rnams la bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di stod du las kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis ras kyi skye ba byas nas bsod snyoms sngar rnyed pa khyer nas gtsun lag 'ang dung
29a3('dul ba): ste de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang baba' bar 'dod na 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes
29a4('dul ba): gan ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bar 'dod na rdza pas men to snyam du soms la sdang rnyed pa lang baba' bar bya ste/ 'dal 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhini mnyan yod na'o// mug dang bcas pa'i
29a5('dul ba): nga nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la 'gron du bos nas de rnams kyis zos pa dang bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis
29a6('dul ba): sa pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ched dus gon bgyis pa lags kyi snoms te bzhud la phyis gsol cig// de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo // dong nas da yang za bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong
29a7('dul ba): rjes kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom 'du na kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gan s+ye/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di la bur 'didan
29a8('dul ba): byaste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhini mnyan yod de'o// su ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis zas la 'gron du bos te de rnams kyis zos nas bca' ba la sogs// 
29b1('dul ba): uste/ dge slong nas spyod ba da gra pa da kyis bdag rgyas kyis smras pa/ 'di gu ga gis lags padag yon sa yongs su chu ba lags te/ batsham tem chis sa pyod khon pa sa mo na / 
29b2('dul ba): na rjes kyid te 'os pa dang / dge slong nams de la zab du 'don 'acod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong nams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes
29b3('dul ba): ken ste/ su ka'i dkon pasug pasngas 'dis tha sa yongs su tang ba'i snyasam du bsams nas 'apa' bar byeste/ 'di la gyod par mi bya'o// gled gnon mnyan yod na'o// ma re dang rgyam bdag dang papan rnams kyis
29b4('dul ba): phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di dag ni rnye dka' ba yin pas 'phags pa rnams la 'phrul lo zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams pas zos nas spang ba byas pa nam
29b5('dul ba): de dag khyen pa dang / dge sbyong rnams kyis spang ba byas rin no gas 'gyod pas ma bos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba
29b6('dul ba): skyeg can napas la yon gnas btsung pa las/ dani bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten byung nas rkyen napas kyang da ni yon gnas su myung pa lags nA/ gal te spyod kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag gis dge pa'i
29b7('dul ba): dedes 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar bgyi 'am/ de lta bas na thugs brtse bas zhes shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
29b8('dul ba): lapa/ das mas ga pa/  pa da sa das pa gyiste/ 'di par gyi'o// sa na 'ad pa'i thas dag / phrin sa dpalatshas dag 'a gad / gags/ 
30a1('dul ba): yon dang / ging tog ud man dang / shi tog su ru ba yig dang / shed tog ni koH dang / shing tog babru dang / sheng tog sin ni ka'o// gleng gzhinani mnyan yod nal// bram ze dang khyim 'ad/ 
30a2('dul ba): dang pa can rnadams kyis dge slong rnams zas 'os na pa dang / tsunas skyes padag phul ba dang / dge slong rnams 'dod yang sring bar byas zin to nas bgyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
30a3('dul ba): 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnyed par dka' ba yin no snyaHdu bsams nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la chu nas skyes pa ni di sa yin te/ ud pa ma'i
30a4('dul ba): ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / ku muda' sa bon dang / pad ma'i sa byon no// phreng gzhi ni mnyan yod de'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas thag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to// de'i rim gro byed pa
30a5('dul ba): tshedang ldan pa mi gal kyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bdag rang gi spos na cha dang ldan pa shA ri Ti bul lan mang du rim gro byas kyi lan 'ga' yang spyan pa la mdzes kyis/ ma la bdag gis dri'i skam nas des sman pa la
30a6('dul ba): 'ang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 'a khrag dang ba dkan lakhrugs par gyur na de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa phags pa padam che ba'i chom rtsom cig dang som par 'gyur mo/ che dang ldan pa migs rtse chen po
30a7('dul ba): sams pa/ gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la pad+ma'i rtsa ba phal pa'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam du bsams nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi sdang
30a8('dul ba): 'gyur te/ dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de ltabu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / klu rgyal po rab brten gyi gnas dang nye bar byung ba dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brted
30b1('dul ba): gyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dgos pa ci nag gi phyir byod// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rir 'u khrag dang bdukan 'thugs nas de basman pas lnga'i dra ba'i 'am bstan// klu rgyal byo ba btu sa
30b2('dul ba): de na shig gzhe / de das kyis 'bab kyind du zhugs nas mam che tsam gyis badru'i ci bdag brten cing 'drum rtsa ba'i 'om pang+gA'i da'i pa'i khyo drug napa me dang ldan pa mogs kyi bu chen ma
30b3('dul ba): srung 'ayed bkang ngo // tshe dang ldan 'a migs kyi chen pos pad+mal rtsab gshegs pa la lta bar 'artsams pa dang de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa cig rigs pad pa'i rtsab dgugasol bar banang
30b4('dul ba): dbang de cang pe sla bar 'dug pa dang sbas pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma gal chen pos pad pa'i rtsa ba'i rims srung ba 'ide bgrang ba byer nas dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram nas mi snang / 
30b5('dul ba): bar byal te mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi rgyal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin pad ma'i rtsa ba'i ro ma 'thungs pas sos par chur / 
30b6('dul ba): stong 'akru'i rgyal po dang 'artan gyis kyang glang po chenag po'i da byad 'tshong sa pa ma ca bzung cig 'thur nas mnyan mod pa na'i thun ma byed kyi chal maung la gtsug la gakhang gi byams kyi mdun du rtogs shon shig/ 
30b7('dul ba): rlung gi shugs ltar 'gyogs pa'i mthus mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas slar log pa las lam gyi phyed na tshal bya bal
30b8('dul ba): dang mon na yod ba dang skan cig 'dus par gyur to// dum gan shigan pa la grang mo ses pa la glang drug gu gcig 'brangs te 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge sla byin to// de nas pal glang mod skrag pas gca dun
31a1('dul ba): shor nas pal snang thug pu por te zlos so// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i shing ma khan zhig shing gi ched du tshul du pong ba las bum glang drug gun ma thong nas khyim du blangs te bsnun gas
31a2('dul ba): bskyed de/ nor ces babyangs pa me slo nas khar grags so// m-i na rgyal pog bya la kyis rgyam pa gzugs can snying pos nod myong smos su bkur ram/ des nyen yod rje lanag
31a3('dul ba): skye'os nod kyis bsrungs pas na da sto shes 'don to// bdab mi gal cig ni ci dang ldan pa mogs kyibu chen pos 'os// kha cig ni medang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ a tsag ni dge 'dun pa khrims pa
31a4('dul ba): kyang lhag par gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis spang bar byas nas kyang za bar 'dod na bdag cag gis spang brlabs so zhes ma zos pa'i slebs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lags
31a5('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum pa/ dge slong dag mi rnams kyis lha'i bdam rtsab brnyed par dka' bas de'i phyir rjes su gan // pad+ma che brnyed par dka' ba yin no snyam du bsams nas papar 'a
31a6('dul ba): de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// de'i mgrong byer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / phug gi bu dang / 
31a7('dul ba): gimadam ma dang / dug gi dran po dang / lug gi zan pa'o// khyi bdag sdug bsod ra pas che bar lta shes gnags te bang mdzod stong pa rnams la 'asas na mthongam can nA dag par gyur te/ de ltar na
31a8('dul ba): 'dag sugs sod rnam sache bar shes so// mug gi drung ba de lta bu den/ des gcig gdon du skad du bcos pa ni 'argya stong gi sar ba 'byung ste/ bdun gi chung ma ni de lta bu yin do// mug gi 'u la bu zhon/ 
31b1('dul ba): dadab pas lnga balnga ba'i sngo dang hwags te 'dun la/ des gang gi sa brgya'am stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su 'dra bar me 'gyur te/ lug gzun de lta yin no// mug gi
31b2('dul ba): s+ya ngi lta laden// des gcig gdon du du skye ldam sto byed pa la wA / l-ig gi san man de lta bu yin no// mug zan pa nga lta bu zhe na/ desag ni chen la ros gcig mos pa de la tsho na
31b3('dul ba): thos par 'gyur te/ lug gi bran po ni de lta bu yin no// lu\u0f89\u0fa4 ni bran la ni de ltar bsod nams che bar shes she na/ de gang gi tshe 'bras gtun gang tsam drus pa de'i tshe bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na drug gi
31b4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong
31b5('dul ba): bzhid gshegs pa ni ljong 'argya shing krong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dod par spro ba de
31b6('dul ba): nas 'a 'ag ge ci zlogag/ btsun pa bka bzhin 'tshal zhe nas che dang ldan pa sang dga' bob/ maldan 'das kyi sta mnyananas deni nga rna su ma rnas pa/ che dzin pa dag
31b7('dul ba): rjes su zhing grong khyed 'azang byed du gshegs kyis/ khyed cag las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dod par spro ba den chos gos rnams long
31b8('dul ba): dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba/ 'khor dul ba// rgol la'ong zhil/ dgra bcom pa/ 'khor dang
32a1('dul ba): bcom pa dang ljongs tu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so// gang ga che bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i ji bu ste gas can rnams mtha' 'a'os
32a2('dul ba): dong ba las de na sa sa cig thong byer bring byed du do nas gnas pa den pas kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ong ngo zhes los so// bos nas kyang dod dod par gyur nas bdag cag sngon kyi dge slong gta mas yul dbus nas
32a3('dul ba): gas so// de gal te 'dir 'ongs na gdon me za bar bdag cag 'di nas kyang sngags par 'gyur kyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam mo// de na pas rigs kyi khyim dag tu dong nas smras pa/ chos thob pa
32a4('dul ba): dacig/ chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag de ci lags shes ldan dag bltas zin gyis 'gro'o// ci'i slad du re shig khyed cag ga 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa ni kho bo cag gis mthong gis
32a5('dul ba): srid chung ba ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo // 'phags padag bdag cag le rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shos ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma su gro'i ser ba 'bebs shing du ma dag bu med/ 
32a6('dul ba): pa dang / khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo // 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na gang gi dus khe nar gzhes par bgyi bde kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi 'am/ bzhugs shig ma bzhud cig/ de rnams
32a7('dul ba): basmras pa/ bdag cag tsa ste 'dug/ khyed cag khong cag gi nyan du sa btub po// 'phags pa dag gsungs shig mnyan par bgyi'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag grong khyer bzang skye
32a8('dul ba): tshigasasems cad gnasanas srung sa grong byer bang byed kyi ning du rgyad cig tu sngon pa rnams dos shig/ 'dug gnas rnams ni zhig cin/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i zhing rnams chod cig dran
32b1('dul ba): de gsugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig dang thams cad pala'o// de dmas kyis gro khyur bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas grong
32b2('dul ba): da kyi rang du bcud de/ rdza sngon po rnams bdas/ 'dug gnas rnams ni bshig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing bcad/ rkyernams ni dugazugs so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 
32b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti mi yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa
32b4('dul ba): drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong rgyu zhing gshegs par bya 'am/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
32b5('dul ba): da bcos kyi dge 'du dang thabs gcig tu bde ba la reg par bya ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o snyam nas des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ song la rgya dug can rnams snyoms shig// char 'ab
32b6('dul ba): grwa'i 'u la bsgog/ 'di rnams kyis bskams pa dang / khyod ces chu yan lag bcad dang ldan pa 'i kho nag/ rgyas chen bzhi'i ras palha rnams la yang bsgob/ khyod kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi
32b7('dul ba): na khrob sheg// de nas drung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ne du drug can rnams bskams so// char bribes pa'i ka'i bus na dang yang rgayan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang
32b8('dul ba): 'du gnas btab nas ljongs rnams 'byor cing rgyas pa gyur to// mu stegs can rnams kyis gling khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo ma tshogs rnams bsogs nas de rnams kyis tog chen da/ 
33a1('dul ba): mngags te ljongs rnams ni ci 'dra ltos shig/ de na mas drong ba las spongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cing rgyas par gyur ba mthong nas slar 'ongs te spus ga shes ldan dag rdzongs
33a2('dul ba): dbyas 'dis par 'byor cing rdzas pa ni sngon lan 'ga' yang bdag cag gi sam mamed // mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag byed kyis mthong ngam/ ri shig gang nini sems med pa
33a3('dul ba): dngos po rno bas kyang snang bar byed pa des/ byed cag ste bar mi byed pa de lta srid de skan/ sbed cag rnam pa thams cad du bltas zin te/ blte ba'i tha ma byas nas 'gro'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 
33a4('dul ba): 'phags pa dag bzhugs shig/ byed cag la dge sbyong gau ta mas ci zhig bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba skyong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ tsaM des byed cag gi sgo
33a5('dul ba): bab bkag par 'gyur snyam 'am/ mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bcas te gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge slong gau ta ma la blta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par/ 
33a6('dul ba): b+ha Na drug cus gcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go// de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du
33a7('dul ba): gshegs nas bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so// de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo glong khyer bzang byed du bag mar btang ba der ba'i kha na 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das mun khung na
33a8('dul ba): zhugs pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bcom ldan shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi rgyal po spangs nas rab tu byung ba de ni 'di yin te/ gal te 'di la bem skas shig yod
33b1('dul ba): ba gyung dang dag pang po thogs pa 'bebs pa zhig/ de sa gcos gra nga kyis de ba ba' 'khrugs gyu nas cem skas zhig smrab to// de su dede snyed dga' ba dang mgub dang / pra du dga' bas par mi byog pa/ 
33b2('dul ba): te ba smras pa nas bcom ldan 'das gangan pa derang song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snang me bzhag nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom / 
33b3('dul ba): 'das kyis de'i bsas pa dang / beg la nyal dang // khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang btsun pa'i 'phags pa'i bde pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa yang dad zhes bya ba nas/ skyabs
33b4('dul ba): su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so zhes bya ba'i bar kong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod tshur khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang
33b5('dul ba): des ngan re nad med par thar cig ces spos la 'di skad ces kyang spros shig/ khyim bdag yod kyi ched kho na rang 'dir 'ongs nas khyod skyo bcad nas 'dug pas glo bur ba la di ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de cig
33b6('dul ba): rigs sam/ gal te tshogs kyis khrims su bca' ba byas so zhes smras pa dang / khyod kyi bu'i rkad pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des gal te brgya'am stong 'god par btang na lang gang ba nyid du/ 
33b7('dul ba): 'dug cid yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na khyod kar nA pA Na drug byin nas 'ong ba nus sa sa zhes smros shig/ btsun pa bga' bzhin 'tshal zhes bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan das ches
33b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar sus kyang mtshor ba de ltar byed kyis brlabs nas khyim bdag lug gi gan du song te phyin pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das khyod la dad med par gyur cig
34a1('dul ba): ces gsung ngo // des smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod khon ched dung 'di gshegs na thong na
34a2('dul ba): bcad da/ 'dug pa kloT pa la de ltar khyod byed pa de lta bu kya ba cig rigs sa ma/ des smras pa/ thu ma tshogs kyi sems su 'ana' ba sus kyang dge slong gau tam la blta bar bya ba'i phyir 'grob mi bya'o// 
34a3('dul ba): gang zhig 'gron de tshogs kyis kA sa r+pa Na drug cus chad pas gcad do zhes dpa bcas so// khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis bu'i rked pal lnga brgya
34a4('dul ba): 'dug pa des glal te brgya 'am stong 'god par btang na yang gang gzonang 'chung shing yongs su zad par ma 'gyur na k+Sher bya ba Na drug cu byin nas khyod 'ong bar mi nus she gsung ngo // des bsam
34a5('dul ba): 'dir sus kyang ji shes na bcom ldan 'das den thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'phro'o snyam nas/ des kA thA ba Na drug cu sgor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las babs te/ 
34a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyeg byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan
34a7('dul ba): 'das kyi byam bdag lug gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i byeden pa pa ni so sar rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ 
34a8('dul ba): 'ad/ lugagis de kyis nas zhes bya ba nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byams zhes bya ba'i bar gong sa panid do// des bden pa ma na pa gsol pa/ bcom ldan rna
34b1('dul ba): de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang cig 'di lta bu'i chos dang pas tshogs thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod las brten nas phal che dzad
34b2('dul ba): kyis 'ab pa khon 'gyur ro// de das kyim ba dag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mag bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/ de kyem du phyin nas grong khyer rjenang du kA
34b3('dul ba): ci'i phung po bcer te tshigs bcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags skyon bcom rtsod med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa gser gyi mdog can lta 'dod pa/ 
34b4('dul ba): la bshang du dengs shig de yi nanor ni kho bos gzhal/ skye bo'i tshigs kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dge slong gau ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur rab/ des smras pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de
34b5('dul ba): bas na tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas la tshogs kho nas bshig tu zad mod/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'thung bar brtsams so// 
34b6('dul ba): ma rus pa dang gnod sbyin lagan rdo rje 'dul pa'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas rab thal nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma kha cig na la mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngod kyi dge ba' dru bas yang dag da
34b7('dul ba): bsgyu na klung ngo // de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag chad gcig tshun chad 'khor bar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan ted/ 
34b8('dul ba): la 'dun gyi gung la gdan ba shams pa nyid la bzhugs nas sems can du bdag gi sung la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de bos nas kha cig gis ni kun tu zhugs par/ 
35a1('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon du byas so zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig ni skabs su 'gro ba dang bsrab pa'i gzhin mas grangs sogs bya pa'i bar god ma bzhin du'o// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa/ 
35a2('dul ba): pa sa ldan sa/  dpa na kyi sa las seM //  sa lag gis gsol pa/ bam na dus gsapas kyi pas dugs so// 
35a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyim bdag zas kyis dus las yol bar gyur to// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
35a4('dul ba): skul pa/ sar dang / bra rab dang / thugs dang / sha kha dang / bting bdag go// de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos me len dag bkug ste smras pa/ shes ldan dag dus pa yin pa'i bca' ba rnams
35a5('dul ba): radusta gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so// de nas khyim bdag lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang /

35a7('dul ba): skye ba bzhin du brgyal te gshegs pa kyis bdag lug gas gsol pa/ bcom ldan thus kyi spun chags kyi zong ga la cwa dag bzhis shi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
35a8('dul ba): na sa kyisag lu sa kyi tshogs pag phrul pa dang / dge slong mas kyis sun ga gis tha rgya mazhes nas pacom ldan 'das kyis bka yul pa/ ru bar byed pas so// 
35b1('dul ba): rung byed pa med das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum pa/ dge tshul gyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba lakhor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tul bya
35b2('dul ba): pa'i gzhi bcu bar gser dang lce len par gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de'i lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye ba 'dor
35b3('dul ba): lang bar byed pa las dgongs ste gsungs kyis mi blang ba ni ma yin te/ de bas na dge tshul gyis blang bar bya blangs nas bdag gir nom bya'o// khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bu rab dag
35b4('dul ba): bzhes shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pa 'ab dge tshul med
35b5('dul ba): dang dge slong gis dge bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas rang nyid kyis bkur bar 'o// dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa
35b6('dul ba): 'khrus nas byid len byas te lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas dge slong ga mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i sran
35b7('dul ba): de bdag dang tshangs pa la tshatshungs pa par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhig bdun par byin gyis brlab po zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
35b8('dul ba): nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ra ma zhig bdun par byed kyis brlab par bya'o zhes ga kyangs su zhig gis 'tshal bar ba kyi lags/ nye ba 'khor gang bag ldan pas kyi
36a1('dul ba): nye lam du zhugs pa dang snang ba byas pa dang / nad pa dang / dge bskos dang / lag gi blas so// dge slong ljongs rgyur ches pa rnams kyis 'bras dang bye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las
36a2('dul ba): la gyis ngal nas bza' bar 'dod na 'gyod pas ma zos pa skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas de
36a3('dul ba): bya ba byed mi nus pas 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sngags
36a4('dul ba): zas dang bcas pa nyid du mur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skrag ma'i tshal bas bzha sa chus bkru bar bya'o// 'on kyang zas med par byam nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das

37a1('dul ba): cid nor ma dab/ longs spyod che ba/ 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/ des mdun bdug ste smras pa/ kye da rje kho bo 'khod dadu bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi brda' ba yod dam/ des

37b7('dul ba): dang 'dig pas kya byas pa dge pa pa gang yin pa das da rked pal sngab rgya da 'anag 'du pa myong zhing pa gang sa ga kyi nyid su
38a1('dul ba): yongs su pa dpar mi 'gyur zhing 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas 'di pas byed par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig
38a2('dul ba): mna' mas skyon las btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'das/ bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar na des 'argya'am stong
38a3('dul ba): / bran pos smin las btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te zhing rol gcig mos na rol bdun mos par 'gyur
38a4('dul ba): nga 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang pob nas 'dabs byed par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi banyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bran pos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi yon
38a5('dul ba): nas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag gis gal te snod gang tsam drus pa gang yin pa des snod bdun tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang / 
38a6('dul ba): kho nas 'dri bas kyang par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po dede
38a7('dul ba): rnabasas snying rtse ba'i phying du 'thul gyis ches pa dang dza lan rgyal po tshangs byin steng gi khang ba'adas kyi gning song ste 'dug pa las/ rdzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grib sa rgyal po ngas byin gyi steng du
38b1('dul ba): gnas/ de khyen du bku bar brtsams pa las rang sangs kyis de sathong nas de bdesam du bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phral gyi gshos chen pos yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i drang phyung bar skam lo// de das khyis bdag
38b2('dul ba): dede bachen po mdzod rnams la bltas pa dang / dzaM tsam na gang bar mthong ngo // des rgyang sa la smras pa/ re shig kho ba'i sngon lam ni rdzogs par gyur gyis da byed cag gis bsdu'o// de nas bran mos 'bras snod gang
38b3('dul ba): madrus na bdun tsam du 'phel bar gyur to// chung mas gcig gidon du sdod du bcos pa la de dag thams cad kyis zos kyang de khon bzhin du 'dug/ nye 'khor gyi srog chags stong phrag dums zos kyang de sngon pa ni// 
38b4('dul ba): du'adug to// de nas khyim bdag deng bA R+Sha Na sI dril sgrogs su bcug 'i/ shes ldan dag khyed cag las su zhig ci don du gnyer bde zhig she// bA rA Na sI skragasal ba dang sgra chen por thung brgyal byos sa/ 
38b5('dul ba): nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha lAm bdag che ge mo zhig ces bya bas mdzod dang ba rnams phye ba lags so// rgyal pos smras
38b6('dul ba): bang gdug te 'dige rten thams cad gi zin pa de kyi khyim bdag des mdzod dang bang ba rnams kyi'am/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag de ga shig// de dpas kyis bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal byos sbas pa khyim
38b7('dul ba): gang gi ga na thabs padun chen pa de'i 'i khyod kyi mdzo dang pa 'arnams kyi'am/ sgrama'i 'do nga na /  rnam pa'i 'bras bu de pa lags so// rgyal po / 
38b8('dul ba): rin du ste// de skabs de kyis par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag nyid chen po dem bsod snyoms phul lam/ sku bdag gi 'phul lo// de ying lhag par da pa kru 'ag/ 
39a1('dul ba): tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ kye ma'o yon tan las kyang ba'i// spyod ku dadam par spangs pa'i zhing // de la sa bon btab pa yi// 'bras bu deng nyid thob par gyur// dge slong dag ji snyam du
39a2('dul ba): sems/ khyi bdag dang / khyim bdag gi rnang pa dang / khyim bdag gi za dang / khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang / khyim bdag gi zan po dang / khyim bdag gi zan po gang yin pa den kyim 'dreg lug dang / 
39a3('dul ba): ga gi rung ba dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug ge thad pa dang / lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no// dede dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las
39a4('dul ba): bsoden pas chen por gyur cing nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong zhing / rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong pas ches khyad par 'phags pa'i ston par mnyes par byas kyis/ 
39a5('dul ba): nyes par ni ba yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin pas/ 
39a6('dul ba): sa bya ba nas brtsal bar byaste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de / yul bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// sdos ni/ kain bu yis btung ba blangs/ ka shi'i tshod rdal nas thug dang / 
39a7('dul ba): bas 'bab pa 'grab na gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhin mas la chos bshad na de rangs tshegs chung dus drang srong kena'i dri phul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / de
39b1('dul ba): bco ldaran 'dang 'di snyam du dgrangs te/ mA la pa dza budal byas rabab kyi 'gram du bshadan de thul bar bgyur rogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de chos nyid kyis gang gi sa sa
39b2('dul ba): rgyas bcog ldan 'as kyis 'jig rten pa'i zug pa bskyed pa da'i ma smin dang tshangs pa las gas te skarnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dges pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas rgyal po chen po nam thos kyi
39b3('dul ba): bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci zhig gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa bltas na/ bdag cag 'jig rten stong ba bzhi mas khon la chos bzhad par bzhed do snyam du gnas/ gnod
39b4('dul ba): rje dpo chen po lnga chen gyi bsgob sa can song la rdzi bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'bram du bcom ldan 'das kyi gdad goms te/ 
39b5('dul ba): srung ba gcig kyang skos shig/ des rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du drang srong ke na'i bu'i srungs ma bzhag nas gnas shom par rdzob pan den skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i ci co'i sgra byung ba dang / de nas drang srong ke

40a1('dul ba): gos parnamapa dang sa du bar bsod goms la zhugs te/ mdum drang sod sos su dadas pas kyi bya ba mad de/ zas ma bsod nopas spangs nas ji lta thugs mnyam par bzhag da
40a2('dul ba): slong gi dge 'an dang babs gcig ma dus nas mi gnang bar gyur te/ rdzi bungs kyis das kyi grom du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas com ldan das / 
40a3('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun kyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyod dum du ma'i 'khor dang / dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / driza stong phrag dul ri 'khor dang / driH
40a4('dul ba): ra stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i nor bus thub pa bkang ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba deng song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la phra'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhams
40a5('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas shar phyogs su brten te 'dug go// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang grul bum du ma'i lakho
40a6('dul ba): dang tshul bum bcu phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / thul thum stong phrag dus labir dang / grul bum brgya skyong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / l+h+wa'i mu tig gis khyab pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song nas/

40b1('dul ba): dang / gu ku ta dang / pad ga da dang / dad pa rnams kyis zhu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan na la lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / su mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po
40b2('dul ba): dbyas kyis gtod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo thos phyog byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas su stsogs su ba rten te dug go rgyal ba// 
40b3('dul ba): chen po nas thos kyi zhusang gnod sde dul ri'i kho dang / gdo ma gdu 'kho sa/ da nga brag du la ga zhen na pa drug du mi ba dag byakhyor gyi da gas kyis thu shA / marnas
40b4('dul ba): gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbyug dang / gser kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge
40b5('dul ba): pasas nas kyang phyogs su ted te 'dug go// de sa dbus pa 'i rigs ni gnyis te/ yul 'khor stong da / 'phags skyes pa'o// mtha 'thob pa'i rigs ni gnyid te/ mig mi bzed dang / rnam thos kyi 'o// 
40b6('dul ba): des bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongos te/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad na gnyis so nas shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyis ni mi shes la/ gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad na gnyis cho
40b7('dul ba): des shes par 'gyur gyi gnyis kyis ni mi shes pas ma la ngas gnyis ya ni dngas pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do// gnyis la ni mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do snyam du dgo nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong lnga bka'
40b8('dul ba): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus zhig pa dang / tshor ba bsil bar gyur ba dang / 'du shes 'gags pa dang / 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par zhes pa nu' par gyur pa de nyid sdug bsngas kyi mthar yin do// 
41a1('dul ba): chos min pa grang sa 'di bkur sum pan rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang / de dang skal pa mnyam pa'i brib brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi yig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
41a2('dul ba): skyes so// de sa ldan 'das kyi ma pon po gas kyis pol dga'asmras pa/ ma brkyen po la khyod ci mthong ba sa mthong ba ma dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam pa shes na khang
41a3('dul ba): shes ba tsam du gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na nyal po chen po'i phags skyes po dang / de dang zhal bya mnyam pa'i gus bul ba kyi stong phrag du mchos rnams ma chos kyi mig rdul med ci sa
41a4('dul ba): nga bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mag mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rgyal po chen po e ne me ne/ dang be/ da Dab baM 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos
41a5('dul ba): rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na rgyal po rnon po mag mi bzang dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i klu brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi midi rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom
41a6('dul ba): de 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na rgyal po chen po mAShA/ tuSh+Ta/ sang shA mA/ sarba tra bi rA Ti 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

41a8('dul ba): yang nga ni bdag yongs su bya ngan las 'dara' ba'i/ dus la khad kyis nyen su la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan 'dang / gal te lha rnams la ni lha rnams bag med pa la dga' ba mang bas yun ri
41b1('dul ba): gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'on te mi rnams la ni maspang ba yin pas de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyi/ ma la ngas lha dang / mi rnams dang / dge slong 'od srung la gtad nas yongs su mya ngan mas
41b2('dul ba): 'dra'o skam du dgongs nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa shar phyogs nas bsrung ba byos shig/ rgyal po cher

41b4('dul ba): 'asrung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kyang byang phyogs nas bsrung bar byos shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bcom

41b6('dul ba): ldan 'das las bden pa mthong nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi bya ba rnams
41b7('dul ba): gtad dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang bstan pa'i don gyi bya ba la brtson par gyis shig/ dge slong rnam la cheb skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod
41b8('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis las kyi zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po chen po bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
42a1('dul ba): bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs
42a2('dul ba): rnyed pa zhes bya ba das/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba byed ces bya ba'i bar gongs bzhin 'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskus bye ba ba po dod de la skye gu rnams kyi rgya mo nyi khri nub pa na ston pa zhes
42a3('dul ba): 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin no// shing zhal ma brtsegs pa na yang nam mkha' ldang gnyis yod pa 'gro ba dang phyag dang / gtsug gi dbang phyug go// gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'asbyin
42a4('dul ba): gnyis la de gnyis gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe de gnyis snga'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
42a5('dul ba): srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang / de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gis gnod par bya bar brtsams pa las/ ri rab la drung dang rtswa'i shugs bzhin du
42a6('dul ba): rdugs nas slar log pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag sngon ni kho ba cag gis khyed cag gnod pa byas na sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ dgang gis na kho bo cag byed dang phrad nas ring ba la rlung dang nu bzhi
42a7('dul ba): du rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ dbugs 'byin dang dbugs cher 'byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal 'od srung gi sbyin sngar
42b1('dul ba): stobs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// de gnyis kyis gas pa/ gal te de lta na bdag cag gis kyang blang ngo zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig btsugs te yang dag par rdzogs
42b2('dul ba): seMs rgyas 'dis da sbyi snang nga nas de dag rkyen pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i snas rgyas 'di srung gi spyad sta nas 'jig ste byung pa pazhi po dgag ma mos nas deng pa de dag de gnyis kyi
42b3('dul ba): ras nam mkha' lding de gnyis klu dbugs 'byin pa dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/ 'gro ba la'i dag su dag yin/ de gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang / nam mkha' lding gnyis
42b4('dul ba): smras pa/ gal te de ltar bdag cag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs la smon lam gdab po zhes de gnyis kyi
42b5('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyab pa su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhornams blangs so// dbugs de byin dang dbugs cher bu byed gnyis ni sngar blangs so// de nas lhan cig 'dus na
42b6('dul ba): yangag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gapas gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar 'jog rten spyong ba ban po 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan
42b7('dul ba): sngang chos // danas bden pa mthong ster nga gi gnas su mchis pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang dge ba'i chu ba 'dis 'jig rten stong ba bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
42b8('dul ba): kyi 'od srung gi bral ze'i khye'u blam zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la bram zer gyi khyod kye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo bcu grub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kya
43a1('dul ba): shAs thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyung ngogs lung bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das des kyang de bzhin du rdzing bu dal gyis 'dab kyi 'gram du bdag cag la tshas bshad de bdag cag gis chos da
43a2('dul ba): nas 'ded pa mthong ste/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su mchi bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ klu dang nam mkha' lding bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyong
43a3('dul ba): bzhi'i 'di dag nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dbugs 'byin gang yin pa don yul 'khor skyong brngand yin no// dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de na 'phags skyes pa yin no// 'gro ba'ing
43a4('dul ba): phrug ni mig mi bzang yin no// gtsug gi dbang phyug ni rnam thos kyi bu yin te// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro
43a5('dul ba): ba dang bslab pa'i gzhinams grangs shing ldan las bti pa gang yin pa de 'i las tsa rnam par smin pas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir byung ba'i sbyin sdang bden pa ma meng bar byas nas rangag gnas bu song ngo /
