43a7('dul ba): dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas gang thos nas yod la drang srong ke ne'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa
43a8('dul ba): mdzad do// de nas de rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ btung ba brgyad po tsa r+thaM tung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras bu'i chung ba dang / rgya shug gi tung ba dang / oM shang ba'i btung ba dang / 
43b1('dul ba): para'i kung ba dang / rnab 'gyur / dung ba dang / 'bra ka'i btung ba dang / sun m+b+ha drung ba khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
43b2('dul ba): 'atung ba brgyad pa 'di dag ni sngon gyi dring srong rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags pa la gas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das lazhugs brtse pa nye bar bzung ste bags su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srung kon
43b3('dul ba): 'u la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas btung ba brgyad po dag bzhes so// bzhes nas dge slong rnabs la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nyung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/ dus su mnyes/ 
43b4('dul ba): bcags/ dus su byin gyis brlabs na dus su langs spyad par bya zhing dus ma len par yang longs spyad par byal/ nam gyi thun dang po thal nas ni longs spyad par mi bya'o// yang ba brgyad po 'di dag dus
43b5('dul ba): ni len byas la dus ma yin par mnyes/ dus ma yin par bcags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyod par mi bya'o// btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/ dus su
43b6('dul ba): mnyes la/ dus ma yin par btsags dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni longs spyad par ma bya'o// bzung ba brgyad pa 'di dag dus ma yin par byin len byas/ dus mi yin par mnyes/ dus ma
43b7('dul ba): bar btsags pa ni zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyad par mi bya la/ nam tshacha stod 'das na yang longs spyang bar mi bya'o// de nas drang srong kena'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
43b8('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su la mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshang skyong na
44a1('dul ba): mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas
44a2('dul ba): gnang bar rig nas bstan las langs te song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzing bu dal kyis 'bab kyi 'gras nas mi gnang ba mang dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu a du mar gshegs so// des
44a3('dul ba): nga sro dkena'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bzhes shig/ bzhin bzang dag longs shig/ shing dag gshegs shig/ me bus shog/ zhal zas
44a4('dul ba): la bar gyis shig/ bkad sa dag gi byi dor gyis shig/ de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu'i sring mo'i bu drang srong ri bo zhes bya ba gnas de nyid du nub mo gnas btad pa las/ drang srong ri bos drang srang ke na'i bum
44a5('dul ba): pa langs par yangs nas nang sernams la smras pa thos so// thosams kyang drang srong kan 'bul 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong ci khyod chings pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'gron du thos sam/ yul gyi
44a6('dul ba): rgyal ba bzo sbyangs gzugs cad snying po'am/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs sam/ dring srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ des smras pa/ ri bo Sha ba na mas
44a7('dul ba): ngas par spod pa rnams 'gron du nges pa yang ma yin/ grul ma du rgyal po po'o sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma yin/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye ba'i chags kyang ma yin/ drang
44a8('dul ba): sa ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/  kya kho bas sangs rgyas las sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i
44b1('dul ba): yo khos nas bsdu bams cad cing shes byed nas gus pa dang tsas pas nges pa/ drang sang sangs cas zhes bya ba de ci dag yin/ ra bo ge sung gau tam kya'i zas shAtha' rigs pa gas khru bregs gos dung smi/ 'das
44b2('dul ba): nyid pas yang dag gi khonas kyi sa das kyis pa pa shung ba ye me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni yod de/ ri bo sangs rgyas zhes bya pan da yin no// ra
44b3('dul ba): sbas pa/ drang srong dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin/ drang srong ke na'i bus smras pa/ ri bo rgyal rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang sgra dang kha spu brags nas gos ngur smrig dgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
44b4('dul ba): kyis nas kyis med pa rab tu byung ba yang yod// bram zer rigs dang / rnge'u yi rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang
44b5('dul ba): com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba yod de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ri bo 'di ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o// ri bo dge 'dun 'di dang sngar spros pa
44b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di kho bas gdugs tshad stan drangs so// de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas sngar langs te 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom
44b7('dul ba): ldan 'das gangan pa derang song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas drang srong ri bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di
44b8('dul ba): daces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'thung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos pa zab pa sten/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
45a1('dul ba): bar spyad par 'gyi'o// drang srong nga po dang 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul 'a larab tu byung 'dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos pa thob par gyur to// 'dul baba'i/ 
45a2('dul ba): bam po lnga bcu dgu pa/ de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 
45a3('dul ba): danas sa byas las sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol banar po rab tu byu ba ma thong nas des smras pa/ rob tha~Md nga tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung ngo // legs par byas so// shin tu logs
45a4('dul ba): bar byas so// tsha ba yangs sa rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun pa sogs pa gzus ched gso yin nas rab tu 'thung ngo // de nas thang srong gina'i bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
45a5('dul ba): la nas grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bsgrubs shing tshis par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed gru bar rig
45a6('dul ba): nas stan ches dam ba zhig blang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yin 'asngo ba dang chos bshad pa mdzad nis gshegs sa/ 
45a7('dul ba): denas drang srong kai na'i bus rgyu lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i chos byas nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo sa
45a8('dul ba): phyag rgyab ba phyogs gcig tu 'dun phyogs gcig tu bdag nas drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsung ba'i tshis 'dul ba la 'ang/ 
45b1('dul ba): tha dang rnye pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos pa thob pa star/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa ci'o// nga srong ke na'i bu 'khor lnga brgya dang legs par gsungs pa'i chos
45b2('dul ba): da 'asarab tu byung / dang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos pa thob par gyur to// de mas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong po de dag dang / 'bab rgyar rab tu ba dang / 
45b3('dul ba): 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka bin la dge slong lnga brgya gtang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi
45b4('dul ba): chen po la nyis bcwa lnga bcu gtad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze kA li nas gdabs ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa
45b5('dul ba): thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// tshe dang ldan pa tshad pal kyi chu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// rje dang ldan pa shA bo bu'i gang dag yin pa
45b6('dul ba): bsgyu//  pa ma ma nam mas dag sa sa rjes bzul pa/ bcom ldan das kyi ched ldan pa shA na nas
45b7('dul ba): pa rnams dang / tshe dang ldan la mad gal gyi bu chen pa namathu che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ke'i nas gdabs rag theg pa gang dag lags pa
45b8('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa yo dgus kyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni rkun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
46a1('dul ba): mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'aka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar du ma za da'i lhu 'das pa'i dus na yang ka bi ni'i gdas dag sogs dang dag kyi
46a2('dul ba): 'de dka ni gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/ mau gal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams dang / shA ri'i bu'i gad ga yin pa de dag ni mngon par shes 'phrul
46a3('dul ba): kod pa'i nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na drang sradag gis shig gnas nye so sor 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyisi las
46a4('dul ba): shi nas de'i bram ze'i khye'u rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde bas gdungs nas phan tshun 'phyan 'phyan nas drang srong gcig shos de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / des de rnams mis
46a5('dul ba): mtshams gang ba mthong nas dris pa/ bram ze'i khre'u dig khyed kyi mkhan po de gang song / thum mo// des bsams pa/ bdag 'das na bram ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs kyu
46a6('dul ba): ces/ mal bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'i snyas nas des de rnams dbugs srung ste bsdus so// ji \u0f7fma dus gzhan cigan drung srong de yang nad kyis thebs par gyung nas/ de'i rlab sa bachog
46a7('dul ba): gsum yod pa la des gcig la ni lnga bcoM/ gnyis pa la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu/ gsum pa la ni nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do// 
46a8('dul ba): dik+ta gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams dag pag go/ nyis bcwa lnga bcu gtad pa gang yin pa des ni ji ltar gzugs kyi khams la bkod pa de ga
46b1('dul ba): / gangams dag thog go/ nyis brgya lnga ban log pa gcig gas kyis ni ltu bangon pa shes pa lngal bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag pog go// dge slong dga'i snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nga
46b2('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i 'das la 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ka pi ni 'di nyid yin no// nyis bcwa lnga bcu gzugs kyi khams la rab tu 'god pa gang yin pa de ni dges
46b3('dul ba): dgal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no// gcig shos kyis byis bcwa lnga bcu mngon pa shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yid pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no// 'on kyang dge slong ka pi nas gdams ngas
46b4('dul ba): ga pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnon po yin no// maud gal gyi bu'i gang len pa de dag ni dbang po 'bring po yin no// shA ri'i bu'i gang yin pa de dag ni dbang po brtul po yin no// gal te shA ri'i bus
46b5('dul ba): gdams ngag log par ma gyung na de dag gis dro bar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// ke na'i bu ni ral pa can// ji ltar sangs rgyas bsngags brjod pa// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// 
46b6('dul ba): ma du ni// zas kyi zhal ta byed pa dag/ bram ze ribs mthong gyur te// mthong nas ke na'i bu la dris// bag ma len ta ma 'on te ci// rgyal po yul 'khor mgron pos sam/ 
46b7('dul ba): kyi mchod sbyin che dus sam// dris pa de ni bdag la smos// bdag ni bag ma mi len la// rgyal po 'am yul 'khor 'gron ma pos// bdag gis sangs rgyas sems dpal
47a1('dul ba): mchog/ gdugs mod la na sbyin ngas so// dbos sangs rgyas mthos nas// yid skyo ba ni skyes gyur te// sangs rgyas de ni ke na'i bu// dris pa de ni bdag la
47a2('dul ba): 6 dgas sa skyes pa'o// ldan pa gang ga ma d+ma// de ngos pan / ldan pas// de bas sa sarnaMs shes bya'o// 'dus byas 'jig pa'i 'byung ba sa/ 
47a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la// de bzhin ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing / 
47a4('dul ba): thams cad ma khyen cing thams cad gzigs// de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// mngon par shes bya mngon shes byas// bsgom par bya ba rnams kyang bsgoms// spang bar bya ba
47a5('dul ba): de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// gang zhig bltam par gyur pa na// rgya mtshor bor bcas pa yi// sa 'di rab tu g.yos mdzad pa// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// 
47a6('dul ba): gang gis bdudu dngan ga zo yi// Na lag bzhin bcas btsam nas ni// de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa// de la bal sngar phyag 'tshal lo// hrIHsI'i grong bzhud nas// gangs
47a7('dul ba): rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo de bskor ba// de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis 'dod chags bcing bas bcings// 'dod chags zhe sdang gis gdus
47a8('dul ba): pa'i rnamams can yang ba grol ma dpa'o// de la phal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas pam ldan gang zhigan// nam 'dren don rdza srid na// shAt+ya'i sras pa 'od sa
47b1('dul ba): ming nyid nas klubs su 'gro// tsha la sdug yid du 'ong ba de// gang na ba ni bram ze'i chos// dri ba rgyal po lta bu yi// sangs rgyas bla ma da mthong bar 'gyur// na bza' dung smrin 'od snga
47b2('dul ba): rags ris dog nyi ma 'od ce na// de bzhin gas ni btsam yi// gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin// sal shing gi sa tog nga//  ni ga ma / 28/ 
47b3('dul ba): tshogs spras pa yi// rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no// n+ya kro d+ha lta bur ni// mchu zheng gab par snang ba dang // khor yug 'dom gang 'ad kyis de// kun nas sdang ba dag tu mdzad/ 
47b4('dul ba): kyil srid rgyas dang nye dung bcas// 'dod pa kun dka' spangs nas ni// rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba'i// thub pa dben pa rnams la dgyes// thos dang ldan pa'i seng ge na/ 
47b5('dul ba): rigs pa med pa ltar// seng ge lta bur bsnyengs med gsung // bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// zhal 'dzum 'jam pa'i gsung dang ni// tshangs pa'i gsung dang snyan pa'i gsung
47b6('dul ba): nga yi sgra li gsung lta bu'i// sangs kyis bram ze mthong bar gyung // zla ba dag pa nam mkha' lA// rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs bskor pa'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu lI// sangs rgyas bram ze ma
47b7('dul ba): 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od bapa ldan pa// rnam mkha'i ngos la mdzes lta ya~M/ sangs rgyas mun pa bral srur cing // mangs pa bram ze mthong bar 'gyur// de k+Shu wu ba'i klum mog ni/ nog dang ldan pa mig yo gnas// skyes bu zhum sa
47b8('dul ba): sa bcwa ldan/ sangs rgyas bras ze mthong bar 'jub/ rgya ma che dag ni gting zab pa'i// chu chen tshad gzung ma lta'o// sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa yi mchog khams kyis mi byab cwa 'a payod/ nas po khyogs las su
48a1('dul ba): nyim ma'a' lags pa pa dang / me mi phung po sa rab lha'i// go tam sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/  ga yor los spya rgyal lo// zhabs 'bring bye bas yongs bskob sta// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sa
48a2('dul ba): com rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes// 'dod pa rnams la dbang sngar dang // ji ltar tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar// song gsum gyon 'jig rten 'ams/ thub pa dang ni snar bar mdang / gang thos nyes pashi yur she/ snga
48a3('dul ba): bsngalam ma chen lag smos gsug bsnga rnas pa dus dang / sdug bsngal zin /  gang min dang / suzhes pa mi gapa don pa dang / lam ni man lan ni can nags/ shAng kyim panal rji du'i bdan pa da'adi
48a4('dul ba): dngad med napas la na sbyin zhing / da pa rnams cad byad kyang mang de// gnad pa rnams kyi srubs gyur pas// skye dgu sdug bsngal grol bar ma dang / mud par gyur pa'i sems cad dang / blun po la mgo la chu ba dang // bde ba mya ngan 'das la
48a5('dul ba): ba'i/ lam ni drang po rab tu ston// 'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar zhing // gti mug rab 'bar skye dku rnams// de ltar sprin chen char 'bebs ltar// thub pa chen po'o she bar yang da// gzugs dang kha dog stobs ldan pa// de dang 'drang
48a6('dul ba): sa las/ skum grags skabs mchag ldan pa na/  tsa bzhin du shin du gnas// rked dang ma nad pa di mug dang / srad pa dang ni bstod pa dang / grags pa dang nam grags pas// rgya las bdam bzhin pa gos// zhwa gcod pa nan sa
48a7('dul ba): / ma byin pa la dga' mi byed// bden pa gsung shing tshangs par spyod// da ni phram spangs pa yin// tshig rtsu ba dag ni mi gsung zhing // dus su bab pa 'jas par gsung // de ni 'dod la brnab sems med// skye bo rnams la de
48a8('dul ba): sems byasas// yang dang sa sum su mchogs/ ting nge du su ma snod sul ga/ khas pa gtan chen pa mad shes dru/ du 'phrul kyis des pa la gshegs/  dang pa skrad de/ gang yi rnas pa myogs
48b1('dul ba): da ba sa man / sug dag ga rna dang/  ba na /  ma
48b2('dul ba): shin tu mya ngan 'das/ dbang zin ning thugs ni 'a// mtshon gang ba bzhin du gnas// padad+ma ma'i rdzi na glang po cha// dam pa drug bcu lon pa ltar// mthong na ngoms ni mi shes pas// bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur// 
48b3('dul ba): ste/ de yi sku ni skyes chen gyi// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' shed// gze brjid me yi phung po bzhi// gang gis lo brgya cheng bar ni// slob pa'i bsngags pa brjod byas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa
48b4('dul ba): med pas/ de di ba sbyin mi 'gyur ro// bram ze gang gi sad mthong ba// de yi rnyed pa blan med// gang gis mthong bas skabs song ba// de yi rnyed bde bas 'asha pa// bram ze bos thub chen gyi// bsngags pa thos nas skyob
48b5('dul ba): D+ha/ dben pa'i sems kyi rtogs pa yis// ken 'bul 'di skad sbas/ par gyur pa la bdag gis ni// de 'dra'i bsngag pa thos pa kyang // ken 'chad pa dang sbyar na// den 'jig rten kun gyi gtso// chongs nor dag dod gnyir
48b6('dul ba): pA rA/ khyod kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshan spongs// de la bkur sti gus byos dang // bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur// bram ze khye'u ni lnga brgya yis// slob ma dag gis mdun pa dar te// sangs rgyas bzhugs pa brdang po dang / blas
48b7('dul ba): rig song bar gyur// lha rnams kyi dadaka'atshal ltar// me tig sheng ni phun sum tshogs// rnam par dben ni sgra med cing // bya yi chags kyis bsnyen gyu ba// mi man gdug pa mi rgyu ba// shAkya'i sras kyis bsnyen pa
48b8('dul ba): sa sa ma ba rdzags pagrong /  'dul ga 'i sgru/ skye das pa na no/ ma lan gyinags la// gis ldan cig m+sa mi pa 'am/ ma
49a1('dul ba): // ka'i sgra dbyangs can// sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas// ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa// ngal dad ni yod mer te// nyes pa med cing sdig pa med// the tsho pa thams cad rnam par med// 
49a2('dul ba): ba krol zhing mo ldan pa/ nga ni bag sa pas sad/ ga rtenan ni dus med na// gtsang dang dgal drang bad/ sa na nam keng gcang ste// 'o dang rigs pa kun las nal// rig byed kyang 'angs
49a3('dul ba): legs// stan 'di la ni legs par 'dug// bram ze cig bde'am khyed// lus ni ngal bar ma gyur med// dpa' bo chen po khyod mthong bas// thub pa chen po da ltar bde// rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa ltar// yid
49a4('dul ba): des da' ba yis// de dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i gtam// rim pa bzhin du byas nas ni//  nas bram ze 'dzem pa dang / dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug par gyur// klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzi// rig byed
49a5('dul ba): grub kyi rig mthar phyir// bram zer po 'dug nas ni// nub pa'i mtshar la rtog par byed// 'jig rten kyi ni mgod pa yi// sku la mtshan ni sum cu mthong // ljags srab 'doms spu sbubs nub pa// 
49a6('dul ba): gnyis la ri 'i the tshom grwa/ ba pa chen po'i mtshan nams la// the tshom yid gnyis kyung das ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi pa'i rigs/ bden pa'i mtshan la yangs nus pa// rngub pa chen po'i mtshan
49a7('dul ba): dpas ni/ sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa ga / go tas khyod kyis sku dag la// gnyis ni g.yang sdang ba zab bo// mi yi dam pa 'doms kyi ri// swa bsgrubs su nub lags sa so// lcags pabang gis ni bkyi
49a8('dul ba): pa/ ci gzhung ba ma lags grang/ thub chen bdag gis ci nas kyang // sngags ring glo bar chud 'grer ba// ljags srab srur du brgyab mdzad de/ bdag gi 'i tshom bsal du gsol// rnam par 'dren rnams 'jig
49b1('dul ba): tad du// rgyal sa ngan lan 'aka' 'gyur// yu dus sa ngab rtag bzhin// nub pa can ya kon pa lags/ sos ga zhom pacha ba dang na// bkras pa lan 'aya bas dang / nad pa sman la ji lta'ang// ston pa la
49b2('dul ba): kyad// ga la ba ka'i sgra dbyangs can// sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal pa'i bags// delal ni slar gsul la// bram patho tshom spang bar gyis// ljags kyis spyan dang snyun dag ni/ rab tu khebs par// gas
49b3('dul ba): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khabs par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul bzhi la mkhas pa yis// rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pas// thub pa'i 'doms swa sbubs nub pa// bram ze ri bos mthang bar gyur/ ba pa chen pos
49b4('dul ba): rnams pa// the chos med cing zug du phung // sems kyi rtog pa rab dga' nas// ri bo yas ni tshig gsal pa// sum cu gnyis dang dpe byad rnams// bdag gis gsang tshig las thos pa// de kun khyod kyi sku 'di la/ 
49b5('dul ba): yongs su rdzogs te sa chang med// dag dang ldan pa spyod pa bzang // legs par 'khrungs pas bltan sdug/ nyan thos dge 'dun dbus na ni// gdugs bdal pa ni lta bur mdzes// dam par bsngags po khyod la
49b6('dul ba): ge slong dngos pos ci zhig pa e+e/ ma~M ya~M khru me cheg snod ltas// dpung gi yan lag bzhid ka dang // rin chen bdun dang ldan pa la// 'khor las snar ba'i rgyal por 'am/ sa bdag rgyal po mdzad nas ni/ sa su
49b7('dul ba): los sbyar bar mdzod// ri bong ni rgyal po ste// chos kyi rgyal cher bla na med// nga ni sa yi dkyil 'khor 'ad // chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed// nga yi rigs ni rgyal rigs te// nga ni dge ba'i rigs
49b8('dul ba): grangs// bdud dpung bcas par bcom nas ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa thob// bram ze de'i dran 'khor lo ste// nga yi shes rab blon po yin// brtson 'grus shugs mgyogs rta pa ni// btang na dang
50b1('dul ba): jom pa yi/ dbang po lnga yi dod pa dang // gang gi nyon mongs pag 'jud pa'o// yang dag slong ba bani po yis// ngas ni dpa' bog yul smad des// chos kyang ba che 'dungs nas// 'dud dpung bcas par ba
50b2('dul ba): te/ nga mi byang chub dbang bskur po// reg pas ma rig bcom nas ni// phung po skye zhing 'jigs pa can// g.yul ci rtse po rgal tang // skye dgu byang chub phyir sangs rgyas// gang gi skye dgu gnad byed pa// 'jig rten
50b3('dul ba): dacan se gsum// 'dod chags na sdang gti mug nams// dkun dmas btsam pas na// mngon gas kun gyi stobs thung bas// ngadi dgrab com yon gnas 'am// zhing gshin pa la sugs pa me// snyid
50b4('dul ba): ka rnams kyang len pa yin// bcan 'grus dam pa bcwa m+banas ni// ngas ni bag pa rnams bcos ma// chub cha las rgal nas ni// bskal ba'i phyir ni gnas pa yin// ngi lur seng ge ma me ba'i spobs// nags
50b5('dul ba): bu srog chags dang phrad nas// chung dang 'bring dang chen po'ang rung // de la mtshungs bsnun pa ltar// baM l-i seng ge rnam 'dren pa// rdzogs sangs de bzhin 'jig rten ni// byis pa 'am 'bring ngam chen po la/ 
50b6('dul ba): bcos ni ston par ma dzang // gau ta ma khyod kyis 'dir ni// nad pa bdag ni the tshom so'o// zug rngu 'byin pa rnams dang ni// mig mkhan rnams kyim chag khyod lags// khyod kyi the tshom bsal bar byas/ 
50b7('dul ba): bram ze khyod ni 'dun par gyis// grags ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// mthong ba rnyed par dka' ba ste// gang zhig 'di na rnyed dka' ba// brgyal ma na ni lan 'ga' 'thung // bram 'jogs pa'i ya
50b8('dul ba): byas pa// chos kyi rgyal po bla med yin// de bzhin gshegs la ris gsol pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas rnam paka' phrul te// ma 'dres 'khor lo skor ma dad na// gau ta ma'i skad gsungs pa bzhin
51a1('dul ba): \u0f7f// khyod kyis 'thar sa bskong bgang // nges su mkhas par bskar ba cad pa/ stong pa nyid 'thungs nyan mas na// sded po dag tu su 'gyur lags// bram pa la gan thos na// shas rab mtshungs
51a2('dul ba): pa'i sras yod ga/ le rgyal nes ni grags pa pa// mang dungs pa ng+gA'i'i // bdud pa kun las nam grol pa//  ni zag pa sad yod / sa nam pa lo gang bskupa// mkhas pa rjes su sbyar bar byed/ e ma ma
51a3('dul ba): ma pom dang na/ mam 'onasus phun su mchogs/ mam 'on can dpa sa lag na pa po na kyi gnams dag gis gas pakyis bla bkyis pa/ ce mim gyi du malanas/ 
51a4('dul ba): tu mya ngan 'das par 'dzi/ sems tog rab tu dag 'thung nas// de nas bram be sgo gur te// dben pa 'dod pa'i sems kyis ni/ 'khob pa 'di skad nas smras so// nags nasang ge sla byin ltar// sam gtan chen po'i zug du 'byin
51a5('dul ba): dang ldan pas ci gsungs pa/ 'di ni shes ldan dag nyon cig/ gang dag 'dod pa rdzas su song // gang dag mi 'dod de dag deng / shes rab mchog gi 'asbyin pal// de ring 'on rab thung // tshangs spyod 'di la legs spyad cing // lam ning
51a6('dul ba): shin tu goms byas da/ g.yod pa la gnas pa ye/  khrung khras su bcas par gyur gal te byed cagar 'a 'brang zhing khasnyen par rdzogs par 'ad na ni bram pa ras pa 'di bregs te dang thags su byung bar bya/ ma
51a7('dul ba): rab tu ma du gyur pas// sor mo bcu yi tha la sbyar te/ khwa zhes brag pa gcig gabar nas// bram ze ri ba ngas gsol pa// khram ze'i khye'u lnga ba rgya 'o// 'di dag thal sbyang la khod pa'i// thub chen rab tu 'thung ba dang // bsnyen par rdzogs pa
51a8('dul ba): ma par ma'o/ de nas ston pathugs de can/ drang krung chen dkrugs pacu bas// dge slong chur shogs ka 'gyul pas/ dadag brtson par chags par byu// shes rab chen pa gA // dzu 'phrul ldan pa so ga pa dang
51b1('dul ba): me long zhig thogs nas chang dus su sang ba las/ des den tshong dpon zhig sla dang kha spu ring pa mthong nas/ des de la me long bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di lta bu'i ma
51b2('dul ba): pa yang mnga' 'am/ des smras pa yod do// gal te mnga' na bregs shig/ des breg par brtsams pa da khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sad do// des smras pa/ 'phags pa bregs
51b3('dul ba): sam/ khyim bdag bregs zin to// de ma gu nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag lhag par glo ba dga' bas khyod mchog ci bzhed pa don to// des smras pa// kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
51b4('dul ba): 'dun nas thug la spyan dras kyis nas thug byin cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa nas thug la khyod ci rung bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag 'bul gyis bzhad la spyan drongs shig/ nad med pa
51b5('dul ba): ces smras nas de song ngo // de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhig bsod pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// den
51b6('dul ba): ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag brims pa na/ dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag ngan pa la mgron du bas na kha mas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blang zhes de rnams kyis ma blangs pa'i skabs de/ dge
51b7('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te ngan pa la mgron du bos la kha zas bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// 'acom
51b8('dul ba): 'das kyis dgong sa pa/ nyes pa gang byung ba de ni dge slong dag rigs dang 'thun pa'i snod thogs pa las myur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo bstan par mi bya/ rigs dang 'thun pa'i snod kyang bsre
52a1('dul ba): mi bya'o// srel na 'gas chab can du 'gyur // sngo sran pa yin na gcag pa kyi snod srel ba dag sngon theg pa yin napa ma phyis srem pa dang / bcog na ga krung mkhab 'a srel pa ni ma gtogs so// yo ldan 'das
52a2('dul ba): phul napa ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas sdig can na srin bu pa dpa'i tshel stug yon bzhugs so// sdig can na med nga ldan pa kun dga' ba'i nang brkyang sde chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhigags
52a3('dul ba): de shin tu ma dang ba zhig ste/ bcom ldan 'ad ldagacan gyi bya 'phrul nas ljongs kyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byin nas sdig can srin thupad pa'i tshal su gapon bzhugs so// zhes thos so// thos nas kyang gros byabang / 
52a4('dul ba): brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'ad kyad yul nas ljongs chu zhing gshegs pa na sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu pa da pa'i tshal stug po ni bzhugs so// zhes thos kyis/ gal te bdag cag re de sa sangs
52a5('dul ba): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsal na gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur bas yi khrims zhig bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
52a6('dul ba): gdugs mod gsor par mi bya zhing bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs chod gsol bar bya'o// bdag cag las gang zhig gcig tu kho nas gdugs tshod gsolan/ de la tshogs kyis kar 'apA drug cu'i chad pa gcad do// 
52a7('dul ba): ded da ga na 'i byed bams cad dbyams/ bcom ldan 'ad gangan ba de dong byugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyin pas gnyis la ma gachos byag bya phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig 'gru
52a8('dul ba): bcom pan 'ad khyim chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rdzag car kyi kyad rnams la nas bya ba dang / yang dag par ra tudaga' bar la dun cang mi gsung ngonas bya ba'i bar gang ma banan du'o// den rjeg
52b1('dul ba): ka' yod gnas btan gcis// sabs btags papabang du chud// klub pa'ang ba legs dan/ yid du 'ong ba tsha la wad du// skabs pa byed pa'i gnas brtan gyis// de dag la na gdams ngag pogadang ni de las chos kyi gtam/ 
52b2('dul ba): la su 'thun pa de shes nas/ ring po ma thogs nam grol te// dam pa'i don la rab tu bkad// de dag mthong bab bde kur bas// mthang ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la// rab tu mgu bas phyag byas so// dam pa'i
52b3('dul ba): 'tshogs gco dang / rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bslab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang bged pa dang / bag yod pa la phyag byas sa// dpas bdag la pan 'dod pa'am/ bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas// sangs rgyas chos dang dang 'dun la/ 
52b4('dul ba): bkur bsti byas la skyabs su deng // 'di ni de nyid gzigs pa yis// 'jig rten na ni skabs su bsngags// gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la// bde ba kun ni rab smin pa dang // chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen// sangs rgyas bsdu
52b5('dul ba): chos kyi ni// bdag nyid chen por mchog sung la/ thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu bsten// gna'i bu'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shenas sngangs tu zhing gshegs te/ ga shi'i tshong rdal du byon te
52b6('dul ba): ka shi'i tshong rdal der sngon 'dreg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu srung ba pa spang gnyis yod pa las bus smras pa/ pha bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi'i ljongs chu zhing gshegs nas
52b7('dul ba): katsug lag khang du gyon pa bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun sku mnyel gyis// sa la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drang na/ de la ci khyod thug
52b8('dul ba): sngag byed dpa/ 'a byed/ gleng gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren/ dpe smos pa/ byang sa pa pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spun dres gi// dani thun pa sbyinan byed do// sa grang shi / du kun dus
53a1('dul ba): / rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge
53a2('dul ba): dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs chod skyo ning mchis na gnang bar bang da du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas sngon
53a3('dul ba): kyang rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dka' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas tes
53a4('dul ba): gangs te song ngo // kyang sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan ni de nyid na 'dug pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'od ldan ci khyod dad par gyur tam/ des smras pa/ bdag dad par ni ma gyur mod kyi 'on
53a5('dul ba): sems su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/ kar dA p+laN drug cu'i chad pas gcad de nas bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// khyod chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig/ btsun pa de lta lag
53a6('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang snga chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa kyang sA chen po lag
53a7('dul ba): pa 'od ldan 'di na pangs rgyas la mngon par sa dang / chos la lags/  dge 'dun la ma lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'i srung 'disangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing chos dang dge 'dun pa mngon par dad papa
53a8('dul ba): de lta chos legs par bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la cang mi gsung bas gnangango // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lnga chen po la gtogs pa 'od lda nga
53b1('dul ba): pas kyang chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dang / tshas dang dag 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur 'des bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// de nas kyang sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od rjed pa la
53b2('dul ba): blo kos phrag pa gcig tu gas pa nas bcom ldan 'das gangan bder logs su bal masbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang babs gcigs
53b3('dul ba): sa par gdugs tshar srong ni mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol// 'od ldan sngang rdzogaca ci kyang rnams kyis spyan drangs yin to// bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang / ji ltar sdig can gyi kyad rnams
53b4('dul ba): 'de ltar bdag bgyid do// 'od ldan gal te ldeg can gyi kyad rnams btub na bzhin du nga khyod la gnang ngo // de nas kyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gams gnyis la mgo pos phyas
53b5('dul ba): stun pa yang hecas nas sdig can gyi kyad rnams gang na ba der song ste yin pa dang / sdig can kyi kyang rnams la 'digad ces smras so// shes ldan dag tshigag da cig pa dag gis thog mar bcom ldan 'das dang de
53b6('dul ba): dge 'dun gdugs chod gsol nas/ de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smrab pa/ kho bo cag gis sngangs
53b7('dul ba): pa dge sung gi dge 'dun spyan dras mi dpa pa ba cag sa nyan to// ngas smra pa/ da kyi mi la ldan ca' ba dang ldang bar baning bras so// den sa dang pa gang yin pa de dag gi smras pa/ migan // dang
53b8('dul ba): nga yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ shos ldan dag 'di dad pa med pa ni ga las/ 'das dge 'du mnga' ba'i yon dag 'phrul bar 'gyur bas gnang nganas de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo // de nas des g.yo
54a1('dul ba): 'a ga sto na / sa lda ga tshan pa yo bang thams cadas dkyis bca' ba gcig drug pa po nas 'dras par 'gyur ba dag Ta ga byas shig/ ngas dran ma pam chags kyi sa / 
54a2('dul ba): pa dang ldan pa'i me byad rnams phog pa dang / de rnams kyis drinam po tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa nges de re 'drangs par 'gyur ba'i bca' ba gang yin padag byas so// de nas rjekacan pa kyang rnams kyis ma
54a3('dul ba): nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsab ning bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan ba shams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas kyang su chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyi
54a4('dul ba): ca' ba dang btung ba brim par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams 'gyod pas langs ma spyad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la blta bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi gyang
54a5('dul ba): dmas la bltas pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bdag cag bsdus lags kyis bzhes shig/ de nas gyang sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca'
54a6('dul ba): babrims pa dang de kho nas dge slong rnams 'drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs pas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to// nyi ma gzhan nin la
54a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas chur skyon/ chos chung ston/ dge 'dun tshur smon 'di ga snyoms shig/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas
54a8('dul ba): ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci kho bo la sbyin nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te bcom ldan das
54b1('dul ba): da mas tshig gang yin pa dam mnas sman ba dag gas pa nan bdag cagagasus rgyas na khyod nyid lags sa nas spyan byung bar byas/ 'dal 'gying bar mi bya'o// de bzhin tu
54b2('dul ba): 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la 'am zhes brjod par bya zhing / dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yang
54b3('dul ba): / ma da/  sas sa rgyas ma gags pa dge 'ang gi she dun sgyu rjem ga/  ga sa na thong bal tshol bab ma ma
54b4('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa/ des bsdams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyung ngu 'byin pa dang gang gis mang du phyin pa dang / 
54b5('dul ba): ngagis bzang po byin pa dang / gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang / gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes
54b6('dul ba): gsungs kyis/ ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gshags par brtsams pa las ji tsam na shing rul pa zhig gi ser ka nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bol
54b7('dul ba): na pa dang / de dug gi shugs kyis brgyal nas sal 'gyel te dbu bar sdug cing bzhin yang gyur/ mig kyang gyur te/ de de ltar sdug bsngal ba bram ze deng khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes
54b8('dul ba): ya khyes dag sa ga gi men/ gzhan gagis sprulapa/ gsananag so// de ga gis smras pa/ dge sa 'i mas mgon med pa rnams kyin ng+yas twa byung gisas te tsa~M rgyam
55a1('dul ba): gyur na nye du rnams kyis 'di dpyad byas pa zhig ces bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pa la dri
55a2('dul ba): pyad byos shig/ dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang des smras pa/ 'phags pa sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs te dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
55a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dag gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ 
55a4('dul ba): byed nyid kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa kho na nyid yin te/ de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge sbyong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsil pa dang / bcom ldan
55a5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag zas sbyar ba ni lci ba dang / gcan dang / thal ba dang / sa'o// de la lci ba ni thung nas ring po ma lon pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o// gcin yang de dag kho na'o// 
55a6('dul ba): shi lnga po kan can dang / ka pe ng+ka ka'i dang / a shwa pa'i dang / u dum pa'i'i dang / n+ya grod+ha'i'o// sa nis las sor 'i ni'i 'og nas phyung ba'o// 'di ni sbyang ba'i phas yin no// de nas dge slong nam
55a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa sa ril zas sbyar ba byin na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kur dga' bo
55a8('dul ba): khyod kyis nga las tha bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kur chub par byas te/ dge slong sa la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / du
55b1('dul ba): sang pa dang / mabyams bcad pa dang / sa bcang bar rnas sas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' dum du gso pa tan rdzo gyi'o// 'dul bgan// bam po drug nA pa/ de dam bcom ldan 'das kyis
55b2('dul ba): ma pa chen mo'i rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a ma la/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mad ste/ hi
55b3('dul ba): t+ye/ tid rtse/ gar+b+he/ b+hadre/ suHdre/ sa man+ta/ thAdre/ shrIrab+hU dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha naM/ pa ra mA Ta sAd+ha ni/ sarba an ra \u0f7fpri shaM ma ni/ sarba mang ga la pA d+ha naM/ man si/ mA na si/ ma hA mUd si/ a ts+tsha te/ 
55b4('dul ba): adaSh+Tha te/ ad d+yan b+h+ya te/ mu ka te/ mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha naM/ ai / bing ngo // a ma re/ a mri te/ ya ya ra Ni/ prad+de/ brah+me swa re/ sA ra Ni/ skA ran ma no se/ mug te/ dI ban ti/ sa ri'i gnod pa dang / 'jigs
55b5('dul ba): pa dang / na thams cad las srungs sheg spyang / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin snganasam bya chen mo'i rig sngags blangs nas/ dge slongs ril ba me
55b6('dul ba): su 'gyur ba byas pas dug med nas sngon gyi su ba bzhin du gyur to// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas rje tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan
55b7('dul ba): 'das kyis pa' chen mo'i rig sngags sman pa dang / gces spras pa kyed par ma tshar che lags so// dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig du ma yin te/ ngi ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par
55b8('dul ba): raban gzugs kyi rgyal po ma bya chen mos phan pa dang gces spras byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngod zung ba'i rgyal po gang ma re'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la ma bya rgyab po gseng du snang ba zhes bya ba zhigaganas/ 
56a1('dul ba): te/ de ba kyi chen mo'i rig sngags 'das padamigasu 'gyur ba byas te nyin mob de legs su gnas/ nub gar bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te mtshan mo bde migs su gnas so/ 
56a2('dul ba): dus gzhan nigan dod pa'i 'dod tshogs pa lhag par chags/ 'dod rnams pa zhon/ 'argyams/ brgyam/ myos/ ra rmos/ rak+Sha N+Dal te/ pag med pa dgas kyi ma bya chen ma rab tu

61b1('dul ba): so te gos can la smrasapa/ khyod rgyal bya gzugs can snying po la byin gyis rgyan rnams thags la bskyed mos tshal dbyung shag/ des rkun rnams sogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyi

61b4('dul ba): sa can yin du snyam nas gos can byed de myung ba myur bar phye gung ba dang / sa sngob pa ngas pas gos can shing nar bcug ste song ngo // yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis bzhin bsgrags nas/ de re
61b5('dul ba): mas su lhan cig 'thab par brtsams pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byung ba yin pas des li tsa baM lnga brgya gnang du bsnun nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dgangs skyid cag las lnga brgya gnang du bsnur
61b6('dul ba): kyis lpags rapas srog bsgrub kyis ska de shAg/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ded cag las sems can gcig kyang bsod pa med do// god cig de rnams kyis go lung ba dang lnga brgyas ma byol
61b7('dul ba): go/ dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni srin po yin no snyam ras skrag ste bros so// langs pa can du lhags nas gros bya ba rab rtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gi dgra 'di la gzug
61b8('dul ba): can phreng ba'i tha pas la klor dug zug gis glegs gral mi ger bris te skyem bur bcug nas rgya sngags la rgyas la// 'das gzhag na nas de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas gzhag go/ sa skyong ma
62a1('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can pobs shig/ des smras pa// khra gu ba dag ni rto gos can ma lags te/ bdag ni gos can lags so// spyod kyis kyi phyir/ 
62a2('dul ba): ga la ma smra ba/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ sa skyong 'ongams ma 'ongs pa legs so// wA bdag
62a3('dul ba): mchis lags so// nye gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha khrid de mchis kyang mchis la khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so// cigag zir/ ge gos can lags snyam das gos can khrid de mchis sa
62a4('dul ba): bltas khrid de shog shig/ de nang du khrid pa dang rgyal bas lhag par gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas bud med kyi yul gyis phrogs pas mthong ma thag 'on nga rgyal po chags par gyur
62a5('dul ba): nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag bu la gsod pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas gal te ngal bu yod par gyur na de btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o// de nas de dpal
62a6('dul ba): 'byo chen pos bag mar blangs te/ rdul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pasan lus 'phags pa zhes byab grags so// 'di dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa
62a7('dul ba): byed do// re shig dus gzhan nig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dgas kyi phyir byung ba na bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so// ji tsam na rid/ sa mde'i tshe
62a8('dul ba): btags pas skrag pa zhig drang srong de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing byung ba rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun to// de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bstegan
62b1('dul ba): gtan ban gdugapas kyang ga rim pa dag par dag pa skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsad das nas nga srong rgyal po mangs dadu la ler ba dang / dbu ma tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa// 'disulag pa ma na
62b2('dul ba): pos smras pa/ ngal yinan/ shes ldan dgal po la// mtshas ber ba gang yin pa de la chad ba ci yod/ sa 'i ma pa dbum pa lags so// kas te de ga nang sa dring snong 'di yongs su smras so// 
62b3('dul ba): gsad par brtsams te de gsod pa na smon lam lag par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'dis bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa gsang par bsgris/ gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar
62b4('dul ba): med par gyur cig/ yang bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni shin tu smras pa/ shin tu bsrungs pa/ shin tu bcas pa yin pas gal te gzhan du skye ba blangs na lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur
62b5('dul ba): kyis/ rnam pa thams cad du ba dag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skye bar gyur cig ces byas so// de smod lam log par btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so// gang gi tshe nyi ma khon la nyid
62b6('dul ba): mtshams sbyong ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la khrag gi char bab bo// gas can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de ltar gyur
62b7('dul ba): pol smras pa dang / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni btsun mo'i rum du sems can ni gzugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so// rgyal
62b8('dul ba): sems khongs chud cing 'dug nas/ 'di'i 'dod pa ci shi ga gas sel bar 'gyur snyam mo// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha ras kyi bar srung shas bltam par bgyis nya
63a1('dul ba): mad btsun pa la las mdza ka/ de nas rgyal posangs kyibar shas gang bar byas pa 'gos nas bdag rkad gas can la btabs pa dang / des rgyal tu yin
63a2('dul ba): nas thos so// de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o ba dgagis 'i khrag khon 'thungs kyang cimarung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang / de nas rgya

63a7('dul ba): pa las der glo 'ur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa kun dga'i rab srungs pas mthong ngo // de mthag kho na me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas mkhan
63a8('dul ba): rnams bkug nas dris pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ de srung du gsol cig dang dgung bdun gyi shin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'in nga nas bya ma zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag mi
63b1('dul ba): sosadapa lpags pa yang ngomatshar skyes par gyur te/ bskyed mos tshal dang kun nas srungs ma'i mi rnams bkod nas nyim bgrang ba la zhugs so// dza rnam na zhag bdun lon pa dang bskyed mos cha lu
63b2('dul ba): dang / gsog pa dang / gyo mo rnams bas la nas tsun dan gyi rgyas cag cag dab/ shin tu drinam pa'i pogro por dag pazhams/ ngar gyi rkye 'byung mang po zas/ me tog so sems 'gram/ glu dang rol mor ldan

63b5('dul ba): lA 'di'i ming gdags du gsol/ ming ched kyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni amra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas 'di'i ming emra skyong ma shes bya'o// dzaM tsam na khyim bdag ming chen bskyed mos tshal nas rang gi kyi

63b7('dul ba): gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang / blon po'i bu dang / tshong ba dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsams pa gang khon lam byin pa de dag khon srang bar 'khung na 'on kyang
63b8('dul ba): kar gyi sa rims su bcas pas re shig tshogs la btag go snyom nas/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'thus te/ shes ldan bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis 'byed mos tshal nas po daseM
64a1('dul ba): ded pa de bdag gis bsun 'grod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs tud dang 'jam par 'ga' zhig la chung par byenan tshogs kyis smos sheg/ de rnabs kyis smras pa/ skyem
64a2('dul ba): bdag sngo tshogs la nas khrims su bcas / da med de chen pa kyin mi gta gi tshogs kyis byed do// zhes bcus pa yin gyis de sheg bu me de tse 'dra ba zhig bltas srid de shog shi
64a3('dul ba): nad du srid nge 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang yang rnomun sa mtshogs pa mthongango na ba tshogs thams cad de mtshar du ltung ba'i mig dgrad de kun brtags par brtsams nas sbas pa/ khyim ba dag 'di ni bud med na
64a4('dul ba): yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyis sul yang mi sbyin no// de nas khyim bdag ming chen yid mi bde zhing rang gi khyim du song nas de 'akram pa lnga ldag pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa amra skyong ma

68b2('dul ba): pos dadran pa thong po// 'on te grub na mi 'chol mi 'dra'o// des bsams pa/ sman dpyad bslab pa snyam nas/ de phyi'i gan du song ste smras pa/ lha gnang bar mdzod ci/

68b4('dul ba): du bas shi// des sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyad ni yobs na des blud pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpu ma shes nas/ des rdo 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po nan shes kyi bu zhes bya/ 
68b5('dul ba): de/ de kyang bar rjod pa byed pa'i dbyung shes smra zhes skyes nas/ de rgyal po'i dru dus smra smras pa/ sgra ngo dog du mchi'o// ci zhig gi byed na 'i rtsam po rgyud shes ni ru zhes partsa ba mchis te/ de'adu / 
68b6('dul ba): chero// bu khyod 'dis 'chang ma/ lha yang na ni dpyid mi bslab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bkye'o// bu gal te de lta na song shig/ de nas rgyal po pad ma'i
69a1('dul ba): / da des da byung po na na shes rnye du'ang shes/ 'di'i dgos pa rnams cad byu sbyi sto // de kye+e /  tu sbyin padas
69a2('dul ba): byed par/ des nyung bad bstan pa dang 'tsho byed kyis khyad par dang bcas pa lobs so// rgyun shos d+d+hi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang gi tshen dpal ltar 'gro ba'i tshe bram ze'i
69a3('dul ba): ba yin pas de dus gzhan nig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas des dad pa'i sman bstan pa 'di dang 'di dag ni byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo // btso byed kyis bsams pa/ 'di ni mkhan
69a4('dul ba): gal te 'dis sman 'di bsan 'di deng nyid 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni legs pa ma yin gyis thabs shig pa'i snyam nas de rgyun shes kyi bu dang ldan cin tu byung nas sla na
69a5('dul ba): / man 'di da m+ba po bas stan na ga na pa sa sbyi de dang 'di dag byin // de de bzhin du byas pa rna mam pa /

69a7('dul ba): sngang bstan tam/ zin te skyes bstan/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'dodad de khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to// 'don 'tsho byed la phrin du sbed pa che no// des bsams pa/ bdag gis
69b1('dul ba): kyi 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin no snyab pa sams nus smras pa/ 'otsho byed kyis brtan pa gang yin pa dbyen cig/ rgyun shes kyi bu myed la dga' ba skyes pas de gung du 'gro bar de 'tsho byed la
69b2('dul ba): ga rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po khyod rgyal po'i snyam nas 'dis ni slobs ston par ma / dag cag la na mi yang dang // de sgris pa/  ni zhe ra can yin pa
69b3('dul ba): dus bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi ljid kyis ni de lta ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ mtshan pos ji ltar bkyen/  te de sa nangs khyed cag gi mngon sum du rgya'o// des
69b4('dul ba): rikye'u rnams la byed kyis ni rdzas cheg po zhig gi rin dris she// khyod kyis kyang che ge mo shig gi'o zhes thams cad tshod dus su btang ngo // 'tshe byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che lde mo zhen zhi'o zhes bsgo'o// 
69b5('dul ba): rikhye'u rnams kyis ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin byas so// 'tsho byed kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsams pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas yanan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na bdag gis ji
69b6('dul ba): brjod par byas/ thams cad du rdzas thams cad kyi na snyam mo// de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du sang nas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin smras so// na shes kyi bus mna'i ngas bya
69b7('dul ba): kyi ren smras so// rkun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so// ngas 'tsho byed ni shes rab can yin te/ cung zad bstan na yang delarang gis rnam pa
70a1('dul ba): nus so zhes smras pa ni don de yin no// gzhan yang mngon bum du bya'o zhes de rnams pa smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ril deng la sman ma yin pa dag khyer te shog shig/ de dag du/ 
70a2('dul ba): nas de dag las gas nan gis gang smin ma yin par shes pa de de dag gis blangs so//  byed kyis bsams pa/ sman ma yin pa ni cung zad kyang med do snyam nus/ des 'das bu mdu' d+ha
70a3('dul ba): rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum du zhin blangs sa// je tsam na 'tsho byed kyis lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig no'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ngams de shin tu megan po ng+ge
70a4('dul ba): brjong nas des dris pa gang du 'gro/ des smras pa/ des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i spyan nig bstan pa las des byas pa dang mod la sos par gyur to// de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ 
70a5('dul ba): bum pa dang du sgyum tu de 'di srid rnam shig/ des rnam chung bla te/ 'i bum pa'i nyid la byin nas de thum chung khyer te sring ba las de ldan 'i khye'u rnamos sa ma

70a7('dul ba): 'di ni bal glang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig g.yas pa gar ba de ring kho nar glang po che'i phrug gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa

71a3('dul ba): yang snum par ji ltar zhes/ de'i rkang pa'i ting pa pal cher gnon cing mchis pas so// de kho na btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin ldan ljin dang bcas te 'byung ba sa so// delta
71a4('dul ba): kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na 'dron pa gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig btang ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de

71b1('dul ba): ra byed pa la'o// des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// des phyogs dben pa zhes tu gzhag go// de nas d+ha shas kyi bu 'ongs nas mad dong du bcug ste rjong par dbye ba'i dpyad kyis rnyed paphyenas /

71b7('dul ba): pa skyab seng zhes bya ba dag cig yod de/ des smras pa/ 'tsho byed pa dag dang mi mthun pa mtha' la bab pa skyab seng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyis 'di ltar khyod ni shes rab can nus pa yin pas re shig

72a1('dul ba): des mtha' mkhob pa skyab sed de rnams phab nas gte'u bzung dpyad blangs te slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dag

72a3('dul ba): ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas grang khyer bzang byed nas chas pa dang mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug pa/ rus pa dang lpags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus
