99b7('dul ba): 'das kyis gsu nas gdugs tshod ma gsol bar bzhud par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gdon mi za bar 'dis dge slong skyon mo nam su mthong ngo snyam nas/ de
99b8('dul ba): dag bol ba'i skyes pa gzhan zhig btang ste/ des btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ 
100a1('dul ba): 'an dus kyis gam layin nas gyun pams sa med bang na/ zhes bya ba'i bdagos bzhin duste/ rgan pa'i ma 'dun nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesan rdza/ 
100a2('dul ba): to// btsun pa bdag ni sbyin pa chen po brgyad bcu' bar 'tshal/ b+h+yo zla nga la stsal ba dang / 'chi bar chas pa la stsal pa dang / bro tshul pa la m+b+ha pa/ brog yo gal sul pa dang / cu na kyi/ 
100a3('dul ba): 'jams nar ma dang / sman nar ma dang / dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa ga ma khyod kyis yon
100a4('dul ba): tan ci zhig mthong na glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa glo bur du mchis pa'i dge slong ni spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang / lam srung ma mkhas pa lags pas des bdag gi
100a5('dul ba): bsod snyoms la longs spyad na lam srang la mkhas par 'gyur lags so// sag ma de thugs su chud da legs so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin// 
100a6('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong mchi bor chas pa bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na 'dron pa rnams drang bral bar 'gyur zhing tshogs dang bralan phongs par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la ma
100a7('dul ba): spyad na tshogs dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur lags so// sags de la dathugs su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbar ci zhig mthong nand pa mi sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa dge slong po 'tshul
100a8('dul ba): ba bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na nyon mongs pa 'am 'gum par 'gyur bas des bdag gis bsod snyoms la longs spyod na bron da las ldang ba dang bde po la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so// 
100b1('dul ba): sbya /  na sa/ 1 dgas stan pa skyen/ 'du sa byung chug yog pa da ra na
100b2('dul ba): 'tshal ba'i bkye ba nyams par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na 'grub par 'gyur lanapal// sogs de yang thugs su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig
100b3('dul ba): na dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la dod chung ba yang mchis/ drod che ba yang mchis te/ de la re shig drod chung ba gang lags pa de rnams ni nas
100b4('dul ba): thuka 'tshal na drod skye bar 'gyur la/ drod che ba gang lazhes pa de rnams ni nyam skye bar 'gyur lags so// sa ga ma de yang thug pa su chud de legs so legs so// don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 
100b5('dul ba): dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams las brond mang ba dang bron dbyung ba mchis to// de la blo nad dmang po gang lags pa de rnams la ni re zhig
100b6('dul ba): tshal ches/ bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so// 
100b7('dul ba): don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos rol chen sbyin btsun pa de ring kho na bdag gis bu mo mngag gzhug bgyid pa dus tshod gsol bar btang ba las/ des dge slong
100b8('dul ba): rnams sgren mor khrus byas pa mthong nas/ de slar mchis te bdag la 'phags pa rnams ni bzhud la 'tshe ba nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khong du btam tsho zhes mchi bas de rnams dkyu
101a1('dul ba): gos sa na rnaMs pag pa gabyung gas so// sa gas pa thugs brgyad dmags sa lags so/ dan gyi dbang cizhig sasong nadage slong marnams la zhus
101a2('dul ba): / btsu pa dus 'dugacig na kyis pam ma badrug du slongs rab tu ma nam gnas ldan pa sbyin ma pa parjid pa pas ma rnams kyis
101a3('dul ba): ban sa mjub ke kyis dge slong ma rnams kyi 'doms nye bar ston te/ de dag gis nye bar bstan pa rnams bga' bums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khrus rnaMs kyis bka'
101a4('dul ba): babyung bar 'gyur lags so// sa sha ma legs so legs so// myed kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyar smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dod
101a5('dul ba): po bdun rnams la yang dag par snang zhing 'di dag ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ 
101a6('dul ba): bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes tshad gzung bar mi nus kyi 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dra
101a7('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du 'dus so// btsun pa bdag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de snga nas dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas rgyun tu zhugs
101a8('dul ba): rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba/ de ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/ lha dang mo rnams kyi nang du lan 'dun du nying mtsham
101b1('dul ba): dong 'khor nas sdug bsngam ci mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zas te/ de ba nyan yang du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar yang 'chi bar 'gyur la/ des bdag ga glo bur du mchi ba'i zas na
101b2('dul ba): ba nas/ dbyung gyi zhes ngas chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras longs spyod par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba'i bar de thos nas kyang dka' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya na po dge ba nges par
101b3('dul ba): dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs
101b4('dul ba): ralan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byang bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' mtsho zhing slar mchi
101b5('dul ba): des bdag gi glo 'ur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus rus zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya
101b6('dul ba): dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i ba tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa pa phyir ma
101b7('dul ba): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du ma
101b8('dul ba): saras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur la
102a1('dul ba): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de dge slong 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dag bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas phung po klag pa med pa'i mya ngan lus
102a2('dul ba): 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dug par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de yang ras 'aka' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar yang mtshal/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dpyid kyi gos sa
102a3('dul ba): dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so// 
102a4('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi mas gamal chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa bdag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag pa
102a5('dul ba): rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yong du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas yungs pa can gang na ba der rgyar zhing
102a6('dul ba): shogs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yas pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi skye'u rdzing gi 'gros gyi khang ba brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das su dron
102a7('dul ba): bza' sham thabs mnabs chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal myi
102a8('dul ba): ga bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang pa kun dga' ra ba'i blon gnas mal me gtsang bas s+ho
102b1('dul ba): ba rnams lang+gA ba dang / rnams pa dang / 'dings par byed pa gzugs so// gzigs nas kyang yang 'di bam du dgongs te/ bram ze dag khyis padag dad pa can dag lpags pa dang / shA dang / 
102b2('dul ba): zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do snyam du dgongs nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms spyad de/ 
102b3('dul ba): zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos mkhos su phab nas zhabs bsil te nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang du rdzu
102b4('dul ba): denas bcom ldan 'das rgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom 'das kyis dge slo
102b5('dul ba): narnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dir snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag ku
102b6('dul ba): dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khrub dang / skems pa dang / 'dings par byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dang
102b7('dul ba): pacan dag lpags pa dang / sha dang khrag zad zad du sbyin pa btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do// dge slong dag dang
102b8('dul ba): pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyod pa dang / dus su spyod pa dang / skabs skabs su spyod pa dang / brtags de spyod pa dang / cung zad spyod pa ni legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya
103a1('dul ba): dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyad pa bya ba'i bsngags pa gsungs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gdi
103a2('dul ba): med par longs spyad par mi bya'o// gnas la mya mi gtsang bas gos na de'i modo sngon la bkru bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron
103a3('dul ba): bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la thug pa pa las/ 
103a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab nag por gyur pa zhig rgyang ring po kho nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi rgyab nas
103a5('dul ba): popo pha bi mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo mi mA gi ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge
103a6('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding ba dang / shar bu dang / gya chad dang / lcug gu'i gding pas bting nas longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pas
103a7('dul ba): tsherabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to// da dung yang rgyab nag por gyur to zhes rig par mdzad nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba nas nang du yang dag 'jog las
103a8('dul ba): bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gdam bzhin du'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan pa gams pa nyid la zhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
103b1('dul ba): nams la bka' kul pa/ dge slong dag de ring du snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te langs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa la pa/ de nas dang / mi rgyab nag por 'du
103b2('dul ba): bzhig mthong ste/ de ni yang dag par rdzogs bya'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rang la dge slong du gyur pa las de na des dge 'dun gyu gnas mAl la ming tsam gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe
103b3('dul ba): rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis deng phyin chad mi tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi
103b4('dul ba): dring bste dge 'dun gyi gnas mAl la ljongs spyad par mi bya'o// long ba spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis longs spyad par bya ste/ skrag na ni rim
103b5('dul ba): cig gis so// seng ba zhig na rim gnyis kyis so// dge slong rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa bram ze dang khyi ma bdag rnams kyis mthong na
103b6('dul ba): spyod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ bzer bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po'am/ 'dam ka 'am/ kha bsgyur ba'i gding bgris dris pa bcad par
103b7('dul ba): gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag gis 'di nas dri mi zhim la sbyang ma rnams 'du zhing de
103b8('dul ba): de snyems la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed gzhog pa phyas byed/ khazer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
104a1('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bas na rjes su gnang ste g.yan pa dgab pa bcang bar bya ste/ zhag lnga 'am/ drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o// gzha
104a2('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong mdze'i nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / khyams dang / rdzing dang / sgo khang dang / byed rim dang / 'chags rnams dang / shing drung
104a3('dul ba): gnas rnams ni dri ma zhim pa dang / sbrang ma rnams 'khor bas gnas shing longs spyad pa de dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyes byed/ kha zer ba
104a4('dul ba): pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong mdzend kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun tu spyod pa
104a5('dul ba): dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong mdzend kyis thebs pas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/ khyams rnams dang / ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khyams las
104a6('dul ba): gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi chab khungs dang / snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya ste/ dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas rim gro bya'o// dge slong mdzend kyis thebs pas
104a7('dul ba): tespyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas pa
104a8('dul ba): na 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcad du rung lags sam/ nye bar khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa mon dang
104b1('dul ba): thos gos la chos chos gsum du byer gyis brlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/ nya ba 'khor ca gang zadang/ deng zhin du 'dod pa bzhin du phal dang rgan
104b2('dul ba): rang la yang rung ngo // sdom la/ gtso ma skra'i chos gos dang // gcar bu skra 'bal lo ma 'gos mthang gas can dang g.yang gzhi dang // gsoras sang pa pa chang sngo// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// 
104b3('dul ba): dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan
104b4('dul ba): 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gso ma'i chos
104b5('dul ba): gos 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o// bcangs ni 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas bcom ldan pa
104b6('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag sgra'i chos gos bcang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags so zhes bya ba nas 'a
104b7('dul ba): tshabs du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gcer bu bgyid par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
104b8('dul ba): phul pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod gzer du byed/ de lta bas na dge slong gis
105a1('dul ba): // na sa pa rnam par 'gyur ro// denas dgan nagan ma gad pa dang bslab pa rnams// ngas nyams par gyur// / dag slong rnams panam smras nas rnam
105a2('dul ba): thams ca gcad pa sangs nyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge slong 'di gcar bum gnang ba dang bsgrub pa rnams sbyangs te nyams pa gyur pa la gzugs/ bcom ldan
105a3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ge slong dge da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma mthob pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon
105a4('dul ba): nga ba dang ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rang khyim thab tshol lo zhes yul phyogs sna chags na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur te so so nas
105a5('dul ba): bsams pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro snyam mo// des rma bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di na bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro// nga la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod khyi mthag tu gdams
105a6('dul ba): so zhes smras pa dang / des mjug ma bslangs nas gar byed par brtsams pa de yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyod
105a7('dul ba): kye bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so// des sbas pa/ ngo tsha dang khrel dang mi ldan pas 'di la bdag gi bu mo mi sbyin no zhes pa rma bya nges zos nas yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song ste tshigs su
105a8('dul ba): bcad pas smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang // 'dab sa 'dom gang tshad ldan ma grin pa ni// nor bu bai DUr+ya dang 'dra gyur na// ce smad khyod kyi sras ma ba dag ni yul// phur/ 
105b1('dul ba): sasun ya shA/ da yangs pa // 'dung sa du sa gang cang can pa stan pas// nor dban dang 'byushA nga// 'a ba med skyon gyis khyod pa myi sbyin no// 
105b2('dul ba): slod dgo de snyam du sems/ de'i tshod dus kye ma bye gang yin pa de ni dge slong 'di nyid de/ de na yang 'di ngo cha med pa'i sbyin gyi sa rkyong ma mthob nas sdug bsngal shing yod ma bde nas bya'i tshogs kyi
105b3('dul ba): sa byung ngo // da ltar yang 'dis gcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas dge slong gis tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo // yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
105b4('dul ba): ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bum pa/ ngas 'dreg par rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod sgra 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug 'di lta
105b5('dul ba): pra 'bral ba 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul shugs yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis skra 'bal bar mi bya'o// 'bal na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das
105b6('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no
105b7('dul ba): bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong na bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag bla gos mthang gos dang
105b8('dul ba): pas 'tsho bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tshe bar byed/ 
106a1('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong gis bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o// 'tsho bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom
106a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag g.yang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i rgyal mtshan
106a3('dul ba): da zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gsom/ 
106a4('dul ba): rabs kyi chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
106a5('dul ba): par gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa padag pa char 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes
106a6('dul ba): rugate muka 'di lta ste/ bachar 'di ni khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan
106a7('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum pa/ 'di ni khyab pa 'chang bar byed do// 
106a8('dul ba): ltasta bas na dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong pa bzhin du'o// de bzhin du thams/ 
106b1('dul ba): cad ser pa'am/ thams cad dmar pa'am/ dkar ba ni rung ba ma yin pa nyid do// sdom la/ kha tshang ring dang gdengs ka dang // ral ka gtsug tor thod dang ne// ra bal gos dang rdzab la kla ma// 6
106b2('dul ba): drang kun dka' mtha gos bcas// yang dge slong zhig zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag 'char ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dra
106b3('dul ba): 'di na mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no// zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la
106b4('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag kha tshar gdangs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gta mug 'di ni mu stegs pa'i
106b5('dul ba): yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ral
106b6('dul ba): 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
106b7('dul ba): bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gtsug tor ba byed par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu
106b8('dul ba): te mug 'di khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar geng ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso
107a1('dul ba): to// btsun pa bdag thod 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal
107a2('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar ga ma bzhin du'o// yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa pad// rabs kyi gas bcang bar
107a3('dul ba): com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug 'di ni khyim po'i rtag yin no// zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ya
107a4('dul ba): spo zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rnga bal gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu ga ti rma
107a5('dul ba): 'di ni khyim pa'i rtags yin no zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can dge slong med pa'i
107a6('dul ba): 'bar med pa zhin tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te sngam sbyar med par de phyi rol du byung ba dang / de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan
107a7('dul ba): byas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas ni 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bci' zhing snron sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o// sod na 'gro
107a8('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' pho mchin nad can na ba de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed nga las char bab pa dang de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i
107b1('dul ba): so+o/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mang gos dang thugs su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang snrum sbyar gzhag tu rudru ba ni dz+raste/ dge sbyong dang bcas pa'i
107b2('dul ba): rgol dang bcas pa dang / cha bab pa dang / chang 'bab tu dgas pa dang / 'bab rgya'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / gro brgyang btir ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyis gan
107b3('dul ba): par gyur pa'o// bar sdom gyi tshigs su btsud pa// dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi// byung ba gnyis po dgra dang ni// rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang // dge 'dun rnyed dang de de'i yan// bcom ldan
107b4('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur deng ba dang de rnams kyi rnyed pacu
107b5('dul ba): kyang ma blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o// ma bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa
107b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o// blangs na 'gal tshabs can du
107b7('dul ba): gyur ro// bcol bu'i dge slong gzhan dag gis ma sbrengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mnod par bya'o// dge tshul rnams dong na
107b8('dul ba): nyid la ma blangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nams kyi mkhan po dang slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o// dge slong dag rnyed pa chung ngu dag 'byed par byed
108a1('dul ba): na rnyed pa chung ngu yin no snyam nas/ dong ba rnams kyi mabyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// gzhan dag
108a2('dul ba): gis ma bcol bar dong ba dang de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyed pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ 
108a3('dul ba): del 'gyod par mi bya'o// rnyed pa chung ngu gzhan dag bgor mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis
108a4('dul ba): bgo bar bya ste/ dal 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcol bas rnyed pa chung ngu ma blangs na ma shag lnga'i rin lan chad ni nges par bda' bar bya'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des
108a5('dul ba): gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ de la gal te dge slong brgya gnas na ras yug brgya 'bul lo// de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo zhes
108a6('dul ba): bya ba'i bar du'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gtsug lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis zhig dbyar gnas pa las khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba de gnyis kyis blangs nas
108a7('dul ba): phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed par 'di ni dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro// gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na yir 'gyur ro// gal te de lta na long shig/ des
108b1('dul ba): klas pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang /  tsaman gcig gis kyang ma blangs nas de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltung bsgrub par bya/ gcig gis smras pa/ 
108b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams bas la de rnams dang lhan cig bsgo go// ga gos sa la ga de na nas rbog gakon pa'o// zhes rnams sus bsrung gang bzhin pas so// de sbyar mi nus kyi
108b3('dul ba): gang gzhon pa ni 'gro'o// gang rgan pa des ni gos rnams bsrung ngo // de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon pa shos dge slong rnams bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo // drug sde
108b4('dul ba): rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mos ri mos mi stongs par byed pa yin pas nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi sgon 'dug pa des rgyang ring po
108b5('dul ba): khon nas mgo smra ba'i me tog ltar skye ba smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gis de bsur 'gro'o snyam nas gnas brtan b+h+yon
108b6('dul ba): pa legs so byin pa legs so// slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo// des bsams pa/ 'di ni slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig yin
108b7('dul ba): no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri bor che ge mo zhig nas so// ci de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do// ci de gtsug
109a1('dul ba): la' khang yin nam/ 'on te phongs pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs/ dge slong rnams dang
109a2('dul ba): bgo ba'i phyir ro// gal te de lta nang kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'phro bar bya'o// slob dpon legs so// nye dgas bsams pa/ gal te 'di bdag
109a3('dul ba): thad nas gzhan du song na skye bo'i tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyis/ legs par bdag gis bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de nga la sor bcug ste/ dus ma yin
109a4('dul ba): pa'i btung ba dag blud nas ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis nam sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te rbad pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bslu ba byin nas ji tsam ga N+DI
109a5('dul ba): log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do// de nas nye dga' gsang 'phel bar mi 'gyur grarang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das par byas so// de nas de nang par sngar langs te
109a6('dul ba): can zhugs de khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste// rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i rgan zhugs gcig shos des 'ongs pa legs sa
109a7('dul ba): shes kun dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig smras nas de gnyis ngam sos pa dang yang gsum char yang gnas gcig tu 'chags nas/ nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa bgos shig/ 
109b1('dul ba): gnas brtan pa no'o// nye dgas rgan zhugs gcig sa smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis bzhes shig/ gnas brtan bdag ni mi 'gyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes
109b2('dul ba): bathung na mi rung ngo // gcig shos la yang smras pa/ chan zhugs khyod kyis bgos shig/ des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyod ni nyes pa byung bas
109b3('dul ba): 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyapa 'ar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ nye dgas bsams pa/ rgan zhugs 'ad gnyis sdong gis dbyen bya'o snyam na
109b4('dul ba): de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan bdag gis gtsun
109b5('dul ba): lag khang du rtag par chag chag dang / kug dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so// rgan zhugs gal te chag chag dang phyad dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob pa na lta nye
109b6('dul ba): dag pa gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang phyag dang bya'o// 'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthu yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du
109b7('dul ba): dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ des na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyis/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste lakhang
110a1('dul ba): bar mi bya'o// des de gnad ma phab pas sbrengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs khyod kyis mi
110a2('dul ba): cing ga bya ba/ gnas pata na bdag gis 'dir dus dus su ches bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so/ rgan zhugs gal te chos bsgrags pas rnyed pa thob na lha nye dgas 'greng ba dang
110a3('dul ba): 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bas dus thams cad du chos bshad do// rnyed pa gang chung zad grub pa de thams cad ni rgan zhugs gcig shos de'i mthus yin te/ 
110a4('dul ba): des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / nga'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas pas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dang byed pa la yon tan lnga
110a5('dul ba): de// lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyis sems dang par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes
110a6('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de kyang
110a7('dul ba): gtsug lag khang phyag dang byas pas yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to// de bas na de'i mthu
110b1('dul ba): 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des kyi byin pa de blang bar bya stel nga bar mi bya'o// des dgan la 'ab bas skyedas nas cang mi smra bar 'dun go// de gnyis slobs pa med par byas nas smras pa// 
110b2('dul ba): gan zugs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol 'a'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsul pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la ba na'o// de gnyis kyis sngar smra pha' pas sprul pa gnas
110b3('dul ba): brtan ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdod cig/ de nas nyes dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni rang nyid 'dug go// de gnyis kyi bar du ni cha gcig bshag nas
110b4('dul ba): gsol bar bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan thugs byed nanas// khyod gnyi dang 'dzin cig/ 'di ba nyis dang mams can ste/ de star na gsum gsum mo// 'din da
110b5('dul ba): ba'o// de nas cha gnyis ni bdag nyid kyis blangs so// cha gcig ni de gnyis la byin pa dang de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan 'di tshan las bdag cag gnyis brtsod
110b6('dul ba): bar 'gyur gyis/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig/ des bgo ra brtsams nas de nas ras yug gcig la khyer du 'dug pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams
111a1('dul ba): bam pa cings mdzad // denas mas kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nyi dga' khyed kyis su zhag shi ba mthong / des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas lnga/ 
111a2('dul ba): smras pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
111a3('dul ba): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// 
111a4('dul ba): thob rgyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas rgan zhugs de
111a5('dul ba): gnyis chos kyi smonas bslus pa la gtsigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bad+ma 'astsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'bar shig tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'das rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa dri na nyon
111a6('dul ba): gci/ dge slong dag sngon byeng ba 'bab chu'i dgos shig na sam gnyis shig gnas pa las dganyis gang gi na'i nang du zhugs pan nyas ma la zin par 'gyur zhing ging gi che skam mya dang 'do tshwa chu'i
111a7('dul ba): nang du dong nas cung zad kyang ma rnyed do// de nas de gnyis kyis gres byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni chu'i nang du 'gro'o// gcig shos kyis ni skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bya'o// de na gcig ni drur
111a8('dul ba): song ngo // gcig shes kyis ni skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams bsgrogs te skam la bton nas de rnams snyam la gnas pas bsad do// chu la gnas pa ni chul gnas pa nyi/ 
111b1('dul ba): so// des man kyi'i phung po chen por gar pa dang gcig gis smras pa/ khyed kyis pagos shig/ gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi bgod do/ ci'i phyir bdag la nyes pa zung na mi rung ngo // des kyang smras pa/ gal te ldan 'dams
111b2('dul ba): nyes pa 'di nyid yin no// de gnyis sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na ma bzhin rgyas zhes bya ba de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa tsha bo dag ci ste sems yongs su rku cing 'dug/ gang po 'danan
111b3('dul ba): rnyed pas so// ci ste mi 'gyed/ zhang po nyes pas 'jigs so// khyad ni nyes pas 'jigs pa bzhin rgyas ni rkeng pa spyi tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 
111b4('dul ba): so spong gis dbye bar bya'o snya nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa ru sras nig mthang nas gcig gi drung dus ste dris pa/ cha 'i khyod kyis 'ad cidag byas gang por dag tur zhugs te/ bdag nur rmugs
111b5('dul ba): rnams 'grogs te snga ma la 'dzin pa dang 'dis pasad do// tsha ba gal te chur thugs pas cung bang po ban lta bzhin sa rtag tu rgyu'i nang du 'gro'o// sgyum pa 'gro bdon sdong ngus kyis 'jigs pa dang / tshor mas 'jig
111b6('dul ba): dngagacan gan gyis 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do// gzhan yang gal te des ma bsod na/ khyod kyis bsrogs kyang ci lan/ mad na 'dis nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni ma
111b7('dul ba): bya nings 'dis kyi byin pa blang bar bya stelaldang bar mi bya'o// ngas gnadas phab pas snre na kyang mi smra bar 'dug no/ nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tshi ga khyod kyis 'dir cigag byas zha
111b8('dul ba): ma shesagapa man pa rna da/  mag rten ma ma tshangs su kyi gsas/ pa grom// rlu da nga gi 'di pa pa sa
112a1('dul ba): 'jigs pa dag tu srin byis pa na mod kyis 'jigs pa dang / chu srin kum par mi 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do// gan yang gal te desam ba srogs na khyod kyis ji ltar bas
112a2('dul ba): na 'dir ba rnyed pa gang min pa de rnams na de'i mthu yin pas des kyi byin pa de blang bar bya ste lakhang bar ma bye'o// de des gnad la labapas skyengs nas cad mi smra bar 'dug go// zhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ cha bod/ 
112a3('dul ba): sngar spa bab pas smras gzhang po ci dgyes pa bzhin du mdzod cig/ bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du 'gos te/ nyi'i mjugar rnams
112a4('dul ba): gcig tu byas/ ma po rnams gcig tu byas/ par na rnams dacig tu byas nas tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyabs mjug ma ste// gting du chubs mgo bo'o// bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa// den chos lam
112a5('dul ba): pas bkur// badzin rgyas kyis bsams pa// 'di gnyis bslus pas nga/ ded pa bsnan de skyes nas/ des nya chen po zhig gi nyid pa khyer ta'i drung de song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgunas tshigs su bcad pa'i da
112a6('dul ba): kyis drim sde/ bzhin tus khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// mgo yang mid cing mjug med pa'i// nya 'a tshi shig thogs nas ni// shin tu don grub galas 'angs// des smras pa/ gang phyir dran brjod gyur cing // chos dang
112a7('dul ba): chos smin mi shes pa'i// rgyal po mdzod ni 'phel bltar// des ni chos shes 'che bar 'gyur// des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyas pa blta ni sdug pa khyod// pha ral mnan pa shin tu legs/ 
112a8('dul ba): dganyis kya nas du gyur lo// khyod kyang byed pa sun su chags/ dge srong de//  sus dus seMs da dus kyi ma bzhin rgya mi dang yin pa na da pa / ma gnyis po gang pan den
112b1('dul ba): da zug pa 'daganyis pan// dan ma dgata pa dang bzlas pa daltar yang de gnyis 'asus so// gleng bag ni mnyan yod na do//  'o zhigan khyis bdag cig yod pa das gtsun lag kha sheg brtsigs nas dang ge slong
112b2('dul ba): dbyer gnas par dam bcas so// khyim bdag da'i ts+li skyes pa/ ras yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs chod gsol nas/ dge slong ri la yang ras yug re re bskon no snyam mo// ji tsaman nyid / 
112b3('dul ba): tshad gsol te/ ra rapa yang ris yuka rer bskon no zhes shes so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ gal te de mas ras yug gcig ma grub na bdag nye dga' ma
112b4('dul ba): yin no snyam nas de mgron dum pas bzhin du song ngo // sim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs ched gsol nas ras rnams 'brim pa dang / nye dgas ras yug gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo // ngi tsa man
112b5('dul ba): dge slong gcig gi ras chad do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te 'tshal te mchis na 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang // dge slong
112b6('dul ba): kyis ska pa/ khyim bdag des su zhig byed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye dag khyod kyis stan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag ba dag gis spyan ma drangs so// des ngas de khyer nas song ngo //  nas kyim bdag de stong par
112b7('dul ba): rnams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs pa
112b8('dul ba): la gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gas mthon du me thos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o// thobargyal byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the chom skyes nas se chom thams cad cang/ 
113a1('dul ba): / pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus ga btsun patsho dang ldan pa nye dga' galar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyas bgyid pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
113a2('dul ba): la/ rdus sa/ de lta me me na pa gas na dums khrud zhan gyi lda ba rgyam byas pa de nyon ce/ dge slong ga sto byung ba'i 'or shir d+ham ze 'khor ma dang gyur ba na
113a3('dul ba): yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u brgya zla ba gsum mgron du bos te zan byin nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug re re bskon ne snyam mo// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze rgan po zhig
113a4('dul ba): yod pa des thos nas de nan pa'i mthar 'dug ste/ theg ming thos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo // bram zes ras rnams 'brim par byed pan/ dzaM tsaman bla ma ze'i kye 'u gcig gi ras chad nas des dris
113a5('dul ba): pashes ldan dag bdag gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs par ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su shig bgyid/ 'on
113a6('dul ba): ma na pa khyor sa sa 'dug kyisam khyen dum sa sa// de de thogs dbyung sa // tha bdas sa /  sa/  ma
113a7('dul ba): nA bram ldanan po gang yin pa den te dga' 'di nyid yin te/ don ying de mgron dum thos so// da ldan yang po// phreng nyan yo ni'o// ra 'or zhigan khyil bdag gcig yod pa des gtsug
113a8('dul ba): ni cigasadas des dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las de sdang bdun du mchags dgig pas/ des nyi ma rir zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dang byed do// gtsug lag khang de nas
113b1('dul ba): phyog 'dabe shing bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ dang pa dang / khrung thung dang / rna bya dang / ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams smad 'byin pa/ me tog dang
113b2('dul ba): 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no// ji tsam na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig gtsug khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal
113b3('dul ba): mdzes pa dge mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i tshad du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas de nang par sngar langs te song ngo // dge slong de 'dzim bag can zhig pas rnyed
113b4('dul ba): pa'adini dge 'dun gyi yin no zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas
113b5('dul ba): skam pa/ gas te dge slong gis pa'i lci ba'i khang bar dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang / de dgas te bram ze dang khyim 'dag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed shung bum pas mtshar phum ni/ de na gnas pa
113b6('dul ba): gcigags gnyisas pa/ rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams khona'i snyed la 'azod par mi bya'o// sdom la bye ba rnams pa skal pa ni// sbyin dang drang srong chu bsas// denen nu rkyen mnas kyi// rnyed pa brgyad du bya ba'o// 
113b7('dul ba): gleng gni ni mnyan yodada'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis nus pa/ btsun pa dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na rnyed pa stsal par 'gyi ba ma mi stsam par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
113b8('dul ba): ka'aphrum gnyeb 'kho ba na na spyad na/ tshig nas sbyinano// gang sa byam par brtse/ tsam dang na khyo sa ni// zhi pa byeng cing seM pa tsud ga thong des pasla' ba nye nyams par byed sa
114a1('dul ba): sum par bgyi'al/ mi sum par bgyi/ nye bar 'khos bsregs ni sbyin no// kha cig la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal par brtse/ dang dun ring du gnas pa la'o// btsun pa dbyar gyining logs su dge slong
114a2('dul ba): gum par gyur na rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi 'am/ rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/ nye ba 'khor kha cig la ni sbyin no// kha cag la ni mi sbyin no// gang la stsal bar bgyi/ gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o// ri 'or zhig na khyim pa
114a3('dul ba): yod pa des yi byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu ljongs tu ning song ba las gtsug la ga khang der phyin pa dang khyim bdag des pas byin nas ras yug lnga brgya
114a4('dul ba): dang / des ras yug lnga brgya bo de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo // ji tsam da de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing songang pas ri 'ir de nyid du phyin nas khyim bad
114a5('dul ba): de gnyis kyang can byin nas ras yug lnga 'byabyin no// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag byed kyis mkhan pos khyim bdag de las ras yug lnga ba rgya thob pa de na pas bdag cag khod la bzhes kyis deri
114a6('dul ba): dpa 'di rnams bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyis smras pa/ mkhan pa ni bsod nams che ba shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do// de rnams kyis slaral
114a7('dul ba): par brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa
114a8('dul ba): dad pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis thob pa dang / dge 'dun phyir brtags pa dang / dge slong gir brtags pa dang / dbyed ci dang / mngon sum dang 'asor bstan pa'o// mtshams kyis thobs sa
114b1('dul ba): kA swA d+ha na ga na na na shA smyig sas sa pa nan sa
114b2('dul ba): sa skyes byas rgyas gas nga nas da dug na da/ ga dang nyid mams sa
114b3('dul ba): rnams kyis yongs stan par bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// thams kyis thob ba'i rnyed pa gang nan/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca
114b4('dul ba): cog gi khyis tshigs nog go// lamachen po dang / tshang dus dang / ban pa dang / rnam dzin pa'i yin // zhes bya banas dkyang gnas par dam bcas las lal te thas ze dang khyim bdag dems kyis ma
114b5('dul ba): bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhen dam bcwa
114b6('dul ba): nang yon to// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dang ma bcas pa'i dag glang rnams can byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs la/ dmam bcas pa rnams pa rnyed pa phulan rnyed pa shing dbang ya cu sa
114b7('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams 'on so// 'du ba ba gni/ bas po drug gu lnga ba/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dpas bcas pa dge slong rnams can byin nas dam bcam pa rnams la rnyed daphul la/ dam
114b8('dul ba): la da tshung na ga ba byu de/ dem cis rnam na no// sa das kyi gas su ma ma padag da da tha~M ma byi na
115a1('dul ba): mas yang ma mam da pag nga nan/ dam mas pa rnams pana'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam 'acas pa dang / mam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams pan ldanan sa
115a2('dul ba): dpa bcas pa rnams rnyed rdul la// nan pa ma na pa da pa gang dbang ba gyu na// dpal sa lams can// dam banas parnams sa gnas sudapa pa pa padang / ma sa
115a3('dul ba): ngo rnams zan byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa
115a4('dul ba): gdam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams can byin nas rgan pa mthar rnyed pa phrul la/ demam bcas pa rnams sacu drang ni rnye pa grang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams khona'o// dal bcas pa rnams
115a5('dul ba): gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams can byin nas dam ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul len na par mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams ldanano// 
115a6('dul ba): ra yas rnanams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dang ma bcas pa de / slong rnams can nas rgan pa mam myed pa dul la/ rgan pa'i ma nga chu can rnyed pa gang dbang bar gyur ne/ dam sa
115a7('dul ba): mas khon 'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams can byin nas shes bya ba rnam grangs dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams rtse gnang su das
115a8('dul ba): sa pa'i dge slong rnams pan byin nas nas bya ba rnam grangs dgu'o// gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis lami bacha dang / chang dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mde rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dmam
115b1('dul ba): sa pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phub la/ dam bcas pa rnams khe nas rku blangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdza/ 
115b2('dul ba): rnams sud dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams can byid nas dam bcas pa rnams pa rnyed pa phrul la/ dmam bcas pa rnams pacu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur nan/ gnyis ka'o// lam tha
115b3('dul ba): che dang / tshong dus dang / bzhi mdo dang // sum mad rnams bu dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas dmam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa thul la/ dam bcas pa rnams la chu drangs rnyed pa
115b4('dul ba): gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyis ka'o// lam po che dang / cheng ngus dang / ba ni mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams can byin na sa dar ma bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa
115b5('dul ba): phul la/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na la chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// lam po che dang / tshong dus dang / ba ni mdo dang / sum med rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge
115b6('dul ba): sbe rnams can byin nas rgan pa'i mthar rnyed paphrul la// dam 'anas pa rnams pacu nga man rnyed pa ga nga bar 'gyur zhen/ gnyisa'o// lam po che dang / tshang dus dang / bzhi ma do dang / sum mdo rnams sungs
115b7('dul ba): bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnam pa di rji sa dam bcas pa rnams pa rnyed pa phus la/ nan pa'i mthar chu drangasan rnyeng pa gang dab bar 'gyur zhe na/ gciga'o// ma po chedang / tshong dus dang / ban mdo pa/ 
115b8('dul ba): sum 'do rnams su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams can byen nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rnyed pa phul laM/ dmam bcas pa rnams sa chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// 
116a1('dul ba): / lam pachi dang / chong dus dang / Thani ma dang / sum mngonams su dam bcas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams can byin nas/ dmam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa
116a2('dul ba): mthar chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyega'o// lam po che dang / chod sa dang / bani mdo dang / sum ma rnams su las dam pacas pa dang / dmam bcas pa'i dge slong rnams pa byin nas na/ 
116a3('dul ba): mthar rnyed pa phul la/ rgan pa'i mthar nyid du chu drangs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur zhe na/ gnyi ga'o// ji ltar dam bcas pa rnams la rnam pa dgu yin pa de bzhin du dam ma bcas pa rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 
116a4('dul ba): ni khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// rten gyis rnyed pa gang zhen/ dge slong skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning grang la 'dren te dbyang gnas par dam bcis pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni de dzi na'i
116a5('dul ba): yin te/ 'di ni rten gyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun gyir brtags po'i rnyed pa gang she na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun gyi rabartags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dge slong/ 
116a6('dul ba): rtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhen/ rnyed pa gang nig ngas pa dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i'o// yang thog pa'i'o// khang pa 'i rtsegs pa'i 'o zhes brtags pa ni den dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa depo na'i ste/ 
116a7('dul ba): dedage slong gi brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o// dbyang brnad pa gang nin rnyed pa gang nig dbyar gnas pa'i dge nga shi ge 'dun pa sbyin bad ga nams kyis bcas paste/ 'din byar gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ mngan
116a8('dul ba): sum gyi rnyed pa gang zhen/ rnyed pa gang nag mi nges la mims kyis ma bye ba bu/ 'din mngon sum gyi rnyed pa zhes bya'o// so sor bsnyen pa'i rnyed pa gang zhen/ rnyed pa gang zhig bltams pa dang / byang chub ba dang / 
116b1('dul ba): khor lo dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'dasa'al phul balkog la te mchod rten chen po 'di 'khyer mi nus na mchod rten gcig khon la dbul gyis gzhan la ni ma yin pa ste/ 'don sa sor bstan pa'i rnyed pa zhes
116b2('dul ba): ldo ka/ 8 nas phyung dang shi ba dang // bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang // gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang // dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o// gang gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
116b3('dul ba): nyes 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas byung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang
116b4('dul ba): bar 'gyur lags/ nye ba 'khor rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// btsun pa gnas nas phyung ba ni gnyis mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa ni rab tu mang po lags na/ gnas nas byung ba zhig gum na rnyed pa gang dbang
116b5('dul ba): bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu 'ang po zhig mchis la/ rang bzhin du gnas pa na nyung ba las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum legs na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur
116b6('dul ba): lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams kho na'o// btsun pa 'di ltar gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po mchis pa la/ de rnams las rang bzhin du gnas bzhi
116b7('dul ba): lum lags na rnyed pa gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so// gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po zhig mchis la rang bzhin du gnas pa gnyis mchis pal// rang bzhin du gnas pa zhig gum
116b8('dul ba): shes na bum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig shos so// gnas nas phyung ba ni rab tu mngal rang bzhin du gnas pa ni gcig mchis pa sus na rnyed pa par dbang ba sung
117a1('dul ba): lags/ gnas nas phyung ba rnams las 'og sa sdig pa'i lta bar song ba spangs pa gang yin pa'o// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge tshu la 'ongs nas shin dam bcu
117a2('dul ba): pa rnams kyis dmam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shi yis de chos gis dang phyung bamed yod cig ces po nya gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed nam 'gas pa nyes par bags pa yin
117a3('dul ba): no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'byed par byed na 'gos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres nas bzhed par byed nam bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngob
117a4('dul ba): na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dag tshul 'ongs nas 'di// da ces tshe dang ldan pa dag padan drang du gsal// dam bca' bar na gyi nas smra ba las de las
117a5('dul ba): sbyang bar shi nas dam bcas pa rnams kyis dmam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul shaM yis de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed long shig ces po sa gtang bar bya'o// dam bcas pa rnams 'dod par byed na ma
117a6('dul ba): bzhes pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na pagos pa snyegs par bags pa yin no// mas te spyod bar byud ram bgos panyes par bskos pa yin no// phyogs ni
117a7('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dmam bcas pa'i dge slong nigi 'ongs nas shin dam bcas pa rnams kyis dmam bcas pa rnams
117a8('dul ba): mngangs batshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i ltung bzed dang chos gos song shig ces pa nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa rnams 'ged par byed nam bskos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dmam bcas pan
117b1('dul ba): zhed par byed na 'gos pa lags par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed nam bzhos panyas par bgos pa yin no// rtsonas pan me dani slong ni dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa 'an
117b2('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang du gsol/ dam bca' bar bgyi'o zhes zer ba las de yang ma byung ba nyid du shin dam bcas pa rnams
117b3('dul ba): kyis dmam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshang ba mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// khas blangs pa mas 'ged par byed nam bgos pa nyes par bgos pa
117b4('dul ba): yin no// dam pa bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par 'gos pa yin no// bsres nas 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun pa bsngo bar
117b5('dul ba): byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas shin dmam bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi dge tshul sha yos de'i lhung
117b6('dul ba): zed dang chos gos long shig ces pho nya gtang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bskos pa
117b7('dul ba): yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed nam bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam
117b8('dul ba): bcas pa'i dge tshul 'ongs nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drang dugs pa/ dmam bcas par bgyir zhes zer ba las yang mabyung bar shin dmam bcas pa rnams kyis dam 'acas pa rnams sa byed
118a1('dul ba): da na nus yis da'i lhung bzed dang chos nas yong shig ces phonya btung bar bya'o// dmam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed nam bsgos pa nyid par bgos pa yin no// 
118a2('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'phed par byed nam bgos pa nyes par 'gos pa yid no// phyogs lani'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
118a3('dul ba): pasngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs nas shin dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams ma
118a4('dul ba): tshangadas par tshungs par spyod pa shi yos de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos long shig ces phan btang bar bya'o// dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed nam bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin na
118a5('dul ba): dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na bgos pa legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed nam 'gos pa nyes par bgos pa yin no// phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge
118a6('dul ba): 'dun la sngo bar byed na legs par bsngos pa yin no// dam ma bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa'i dge slong 'ongs na 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag drung du gsol/ 
118a7('dul ba): dam ma bcas par bgyi'o zhes smra ba las de yang ma phyung bar shin dam ma bcas pa rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams la khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa shi yis de'i lhung bzed dang
118a8('dul ba): chos gos yongs shig ces 'anye btang bar bya'o// dmam bcas pa rnams 'azhed par byed nam thonas pa nyes par banas pa yin no// dam bcas pa rnams 'gad par byed na 'gas pa/ 
118b1('dul ba): legs par bgos pa yin no// bsres te 'ged par byed na ma bgos pa zhes par ba zhos pa yin no// phyogs pa ni me ge gong gi dge 'dun sa sngo bar byed na/ megs par bsngos pa yin no// rlom ni/ nye dga' dang ni
118b2('dul ba): byin gyis brlab// bangs sbyin dang brang bya dang// khadag gi sbyin pa med pa dang // spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo// gle gzhani mnyan yad na//  da ga'i spyi bor gyis mig cig byung nas de blan pa'i gan du sadu nas bzhin 'tha ma
118b3('dul ba): ston cig/ derang smras pa/ 'phags pa mar khu gsom cig dang mos par 'gyur ro//  dgas bsams pa/ gal te de ring kho na 'azungs na de ring nyid du sos par 'gyur na/ sang mar dang dor badrang bar ji ltar chu bar 'gyur gyis/ 
118b4('dul ba): bslangs la phyi nas btung bar bya'o snyam du shes nas/ bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa des lhan cig gnas pa dang nyaganas rnams kun tu mngags pa dang / de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang ma g.yog pa thos pa mam lda
118b5('dul ba): byed rten par spyan pas dris pa/ 'phags pa khyod me gdangs sam/ khyod kyis ma gsos te/ bzhin bzangs ma 'thungs so// 'jigs pa ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyis de nas byung tu ga sol cig/ desaldan
118b6('dul ba): rdeg gnas pa dang ne gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas de skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan pa zos lags so// kho ba'i nad 'di ni char skyes par gyur te/ mar dang ma g.yog pa'i gos mang du dgas kyis blong mi/ ga/ den
118b7('dul ba): bsal chags par gyur pas nyi mde la yang ma 'thungs pas de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris ya 'phags pa mar gsol tam/ 
118b8('dul ba): ba las pa 'alus so// 'phags pa ma legs pa shig bgyis so// de bslas pa/ bzhin papa do ni sumagyur tu lur ro// blan mo smras pa/ 'phags pa gas te ma gyi sgom kyinang du rub bar byur bya din khyod kyi
119a1('dul ba): srog ma mchis so// deng smras pa/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul ba rdog pas mnan la mar bathungs dang sos par 'gyur mo// sman pa des mjal to zhes byas nas zlos nyes

124b1('dul ba): nga pani 'di'i rim gro'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos brdzes nas phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / grwa yung drung 'khyil ba can bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsnyungs pa/ skrag pa rnams/ 
124b2('dul ba): pa dbugs 'byin por mdzad pas dge slong de bzung ste gcin dang ngan skrags nas byang nas mtha' gcig tu bzhug ste/ skrag gi tshal bas bzhar nas sa dkar po dril phyis byas te bkrus so// de nas skyil mo
124b3('dul ba): krung 'char bcug ste/ de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te/ phyogs de yang ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do// de na sa phyag dang zhabs bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la nad pa la rim gro bya bsngo
124b4('dul ba): du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms
124b5('dul ba): byar te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo // chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms pasnoms nas khyer te 'ong ba'i dge slong la spos yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so
124b6('dul ba): yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge sbyong cig dge slong gi dag 'dun la bas bstod pas legs pa tshim par byas sam zhes ying dag pa rla ba tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
124b7('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo cig dge slong gi dge 'dun la mas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par
124b8('dul ba): lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi byed pa zhes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sang la gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig na dge slong nad tshabs che bzhig yod pa

125a4('dul ba): 'byed pa ni bdag le rigs pa ma yin pas/ mal bdag nam gyi cha spyod dang cha smang la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ dos nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi mal par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pas
125a5('dul ba): 'byor ba'i 'khor 'ochag pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba'i de nyid rig te/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam byar 'bor nga dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas don

125b1('dul ba): ba/ dge slong dag na pa 'di dag pa na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med/ rtswa mad/ rdulal gzhan med do// de lta bas na tshangs pa nam tshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis phan tshun+da
125b2('dul ba): megro bya ste/ mkhan pos ni stan cig gnas pa'i'o// sbyin cig gonas pos ni mkhan po'i'o// slob dpon gyis ni nye granas kyi'o// nye gnas kyis ni slob dpon sde'o// mkhan po gcig pas ni mkhan po gcig ji
125b3('dul ba): slob dpon gcig pas ni slob dpon gcig pa'i'o// gtam 'dres pas ni gtam 'dres pa'i'o// phebs par smra bas ni phebs par smra ba'i'o// smos 'drin gyis ni smyos 'drin gyi'o// 'khor da
125b4('dul ba): kyang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas rim gro ba gcig gam/ gnyis sa ma/ mang po sbyin te mthir na dge 'dun kun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas
125b5('dul ba): the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnyed kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs bcom
125b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ dge slong dag de ltar 'ba'i zhag tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas de mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig/ dge
125b7('dul ba): ngangag sngon byung bya ba sti gan sa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun su mtshogs pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par gas pa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa ste dang ldan bzhig gnas so// des sum
125b8('dul ba): rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas des mngan bar shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems do'i chade'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de na pa ni da pan no// drang srod de'i slob ma gang yin pa
126a1('dul ba): de ni dge slong 'di nid min te/ den yang ngas de'i rim gro byas so// dbu yang byas po// gzhan yang dge slong rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das ma zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

130a4('dul ba): dmas kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsam gi khyim du stsol ba de ba bang di'i rim gro byed pasbyin par bya'o// de'i nad de yuni ring ba gyur nas de'i snyiring pa nga bar skye
130a5('dul ba): bas khyim bdag de khyim bdag mgo reg ces par grags so// de gang gi tshe tsA pa dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las/ slar lan par gyur pa de'i
130a6('dul ba): des bdag ni 'chi'i zhes bya ba rang gi mchod nam/ den de'i tshi ka'i cher gi nong bam me cad bregs su khris ta rgyam bu rgyal byed kyi tshi du bsrung // de ni sho la/ khro bornams kyis kos rdzal po
130a7('dul ba): sal rgyal la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag mgo dag bu ma mchis par gum ste/ de la dbyig dang / gser dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / go cha la sogs te phal mo che zhig mchis
130a8('dul ba): dathams cad glegs phul bris na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul lo// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa nye dga' dbang ba glegs bu la ma bris pa yang ngas mthob na
130b1('dul ba): glegs bu 'bril pa lnga smos sdang ci dgas/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang len pa de long shig pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'dapa la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
130b2('dul ba): sbal lnga/ dge slong dag/ des dri dag par// khar rdzol ga gzha dang gnas ma lags dang ni// phyag gasngagapa dang nyam pa dang // dzA ga kha 'dreg mkhyen shing ma khan sogs// can ci mdung shing bar bung dang / 
130b3('dul ba): rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang // zas dang btung ba sman dang ni// bran dang gding ba dab brgya dag/ ci rigs pa rin bgo bar bya// dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnams dang // gzhan yang rdungs byas rdungs ma bya
130b4('dul ba): dge 'dun 'dus nas bgo'o zhes// drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to// dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyar bka' stsal pa/ ci rigs par bgo bar bya ste/ de la zhing gi gzhi dang // 
130b5('dul ba): gzhi dang/ tshe khang gi gzhi dang / gnas mal dang / lcags nag gi mkhar ba'i lag smad dang / lcags ma ga rA gI lag d+ha dang / rnga mkhan gyi lag skyed dang / shing mkhyen gyi ljag spyad dang / sman ma mkhan gyi lag spya dang
130b6('dul ba): bra po dag bra mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / kha k+sham dang / btung ba dang / 'bru rnams ni mi theg par phyogs pa zhi'i dge slong ga dge 'dun mi phyir snying gi nag par bya'o// ras phrag
130b7('dul ba): yug rjen dang / kos dang / mchil skam dang / 'bru mar gyi snod dang / ril ba dang / bya ma bum rnams na dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o// mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de dag ni 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku'i ga
130b8('dul ba): rgyal macan ci shing bya'o// thung du gang yin pa de dag ni khang mil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o// khye'u dang bu mo ni dge 'dun gyis mi bsgyur te ci rigs pa zhig grang sa nas ci 'de bar
131a1('dul ba): btang bar bya'o// rkang bzhi pa rnams las glang po che dang / rtadapa / rnga mo dang / bong ba dang / rde'u rnams ni rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o// ba lang dang / la he dang / ra dang / lug rnam
131a2('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dum kyi phyir ste gnag skyemi bgro'o// 'bab snyen pa ko byab/ gzhan pa na la po la ltos pa gang yin pa thams di/ 'byol du'am par bya'o// tshon
131a3('dul ba): bzhug la de rnams gre'u dang / khab dang / khar sel du brdungs te dge 'dun la brim par bya'o// tshon rnams las tshon rje chen po gang kus dang / mtshal dang / mthing shing la sogs pa gang yin pa de dang / 
131a4('dul ba): sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi phyir drig cing bang du gzhag par bri'o// zong la kong dang/ btsog dang / rams ni dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o// chang ni yongs thug stsalas dong du gzug par bya ste/ chung
131a5('dul ba): ljongs spad par bya'o// tshwar ma gyur na dor bar bya'o// dge slong dkang ston pa yin par bas len pa rnams kyis chang ma sbyin zheng than rtswa mchog gis kyang mi btung ngo // sman rnams ni nad khang drung
131a6('dul ba): kyis bgo bar bya'o// glegs pa ma rnams las sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi glegs pa ma rnams ni mi 'go bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
131b1('dul ba): u 'i pos kyi glegs pa de slong la bgob bya'o// rgyags ni srung du 'grub bang tshul ga men pa de ngab 'gad pa'i che dge slong rnams ce 'gro ba bya'o// mi sa pa gang yin pa
131b2('dul ba): driphyogs bzhi'i dge slong gre dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhug par bya'o// g.yeng dang / dbyig dang / grazhan yang rdungs su byas pa dang / rdungs su ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni cha gsum du byas te/ ga
131b3('dul ba): dus rgyas 'o// zhes pa ni cho lnga'o// dasu ni dge 'dun pa'o// sangs rgyas kye gang yin 'dis ng+ge dreg tsang ba da da da bu skad pazhin mo'i mchod rten gyi skyab dang 'dums pa slang brtsa
131b4('dul ba): chos kyi gang yin pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o// seng ge'i bre rgyad par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o// / gleng gshi ni mnyan yod na'o// 
131b5('dul ba): ngagi tshe ko sa phyi'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis chu bzang po kyi dus ston btsugs pa de'i ched na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams ming du tshogs pagyur to// de'i tshad
131b6('dul ba): rnams sngo dge slong bkur ba yin pa'i chu bzang dul sbyin 'jugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang bris tshe dang ldan pa khrum sa spyod pa 'di dadapas smras so// 'phags pa chu ba byengs kyi dus stong

132a1('dul ba): / kun dga' bos kyang gtsug la ga khrang zhig tu gzhag go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa thusas spyod chub bangs kyi dus ston la 'ongs pa dang / den de dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa

132a4('dul ba): langs nas/ de yang lam gyis dub pa des mang por zos pa des ma zhu bar gyur te gsung shi'o// de dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang du
132a5('dul ba): sngags sa// goso 'ged pas na g.yog la smras pa/ de'i lhung bkod dang chos gas 'on cig/ des smras pa/ des btsug shes snganapas kyi lag tu bzhug go/ de rnams la dris pa dang / bdag cag
132a6('dul ba): gis skye dgu' bdag ma tshan mo'i lag tu bzhig go// de nas skye dkri'i bdag mo chen mos smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa kun dge' bo la gtad do// tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bos h+la snga ga bdag gis
132a7('dul ba): gamo zhig tu bzhag go zhes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shi ba'i yo byad
132b1('dul ba): rnyong kun dga' bo la byin gyis brlab par bya'o// byin kyis brlab pa yang 'dis dbya ste/ gaN+Da rje brdu pal dge 'dun tham ba cad tshogs shing 'thun pa dkrung ba dang / dge slong gcig gis graso sar bya'o// 
132b2('dul ba): 'dig na ste/ gnasams pa sham par byas lag/  brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge sbyong rnams kyi yang dag pa bgo/ dge dun pa rgyas pa kyi gas shod duthun pa byung ba dang dge sang gcig gi sa ga

133a1('dul ba): byas pa/ mdzod rten rdzi ni dge 'dun gyi thung na/ de sa bu chos dang mi 'thun 'a yin pas de'i rlung ba zed dang chos gos dang gos kyi rin dang bcas pa la cha gsum du gyu te/ sa
133a2('dul ba): ge'i khri rgyan par bya'o// gal te 'dres bya ma gyu na thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par m+bi bya'o// gleng kA naM ni mnyan
133a3('dul ba): yod na'o// de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs ma zhing dang ba las rim gyis mnyan yod kyis grong khyer dang nye bzhig tu phyin pa dang de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong cig shi'o// de rnams kyis byas mas pa/ 
133a4('dul ba): gtsug lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyang skal pa 'dod par 'gyur du 'od gos/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o snyam pa las/ mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i ba lang rje
133a5('dul ba): da / thugs rdzi dang / tsA thun dang / shing rdzun dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / lamagol pas tsho ba'i khrims kyis kunanas gang zhing de nam ga dang gang du 'dug na pa nod par skyed pa de da de
133a6('dul ba): tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas de dpas kyis pus masul/ gtsug ldag khang dang nye bzhig tu bgo'i snyas nas/ de rnams kyis gtsug sa gi 'ang dang de bzhin tu bgro bar brtsam
133a7('dul ba): padang dge skos kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci zhig byed de rnams kyis ris gyur pa bzhin sbas pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin na nas des 'khangs
133b1('dul ba): kya de na sa kyis ma khyen pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi nang sa mtshams kyinang du 'du shes te shi ba'i yo byad
133b2('dul ba): 'i nas bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yi ni te/ srung yang b+hartsams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan dun 'ga' chabs can du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mtshams kyin
133b3('dul ba): dag nyid gyis 'ged par byed nam bgos pa nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//

133b7('dul ba): skabasna de bcom ldan 'dres la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' snyam pa/ dge slong dag dge slong des yid bcugs par bya ba lnga yin pa la yid bcugs par bskyed de/ 'di lta
133b8('dul ba): nga'i mamang pa des med gzugs pas spyad do// 'od kyang dani srong gis dag slong sa dgeslong shi la na chos nipa dag bsrung ba dgang ba bsrung ba dang yi natshugs pas skyed na le napa pa'i skyed pa de/ 
134a1('dul ba): gang gis bkrur bre sa yid gcugs papa stad du shes pa mad pa yin no// dege slong gis dge slong ma chos gos dag sur bang byed na gangs bsrung ba de ni shis gang gis bslang ba dam med
134a2('dul ba): gsugs pas spyad na nyes par gyud pa yin no// gang la bskur bi de shrI ba'i ma byed du rung bar byin gyis rgyob par byed na legs par byin gyis 'drabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dan slong chos gos na
134a3('dul ba): bskur bar byed pa na gang gis bskur ba de ni shil gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// dge slong gis dge slong 'chos gos dag

134b1('dul ba): da du nga bu byed kyi rlo ba par byed da sa ba shin gyis brlabs pa yin do// nang bres bsdung bde'i shi ba'i gro byang du rung bar byin gyim rob par byed na legs pa byin gyis 'ardabs pa yin no//
