136b7('dul ba): rigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sra ba rkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o// bskob ni 'di sa bya ste/ gnas mal ba shams te zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun pa
137a1('dul ba): gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du ste/ re shig thog mar spro bar dbya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'drings par sro'am/ gral te smod des
137a2('dul ba): b+h+yo bris brjod pa gyu'o// de'i rdzos dge slong gcig gis mi byas// dge 'dun 'aldan rnams gsan du gas pa/ srab cing 'drings pa'i dani myong ba 'dig
137a3('dul ba): bgyi ba sra brkyang 'dings par bskos te/ sra brgyang 'dings pa mi 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi srab rkyang 'dings par gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun
137a4('dul ba): ba rnams gsan du gsolnga/ sra brkyang 'dings pa gling 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sra ba rkyang 'dings par spron/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sre brkyang 'dings par
137a5('dul ba): bskyos te/ sra ba rkyang 'dings pa ming 'di zhes brtsi bras druge 'dun gyi sra brgyang 'drangs par 'gyur na/ rje dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag ming 'dri zhes pa gyi bsra ba rkyang de 'di ngas par bsko'ang
137a6('dul ba): brjod pa de dag ni cad ma gdung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'drings pa ming 'di zhes
137a7('dul ba): bkyi ba dge 'dun gyi sra ba kyang 'dings par bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas gsol pas srob kyang 'dings pa'i dge slong sa sra brkyang
137b1('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsun du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad la/ dge slong med 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sra brkyang 'drings par bskos mags te/ 
137b2('dul ba): kol te dge / 'dun gyi dus labab cing brjod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di kyang dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gol 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to// 'di ni
137b3('dul ba): gsal ba'o// ngas dge slong sra brkyang 'dings pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sra brkyang gdings pas sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ bkru'o// brkyang
137b4('dul ba): dra'o// dub bo// ba bsgyur ro// chung ngu na khab kyis srubs gnyis sam/ gsum yang bcom par bya'o// lan gnyis snga ma gsum du sems paskyed par bya'o// de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba
137b5('dul ba): co lnga lA gro bde bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sa pa kho bo sra brkyang 'dings kyis khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung shig/ de nas sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis sra brkyang dri dang me tog
137b6('dul ba): gis gtor zhing tI gi ma po'i bdug pas bdugs nas gnas sul ba shasas te gaN rdzi brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsnol/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par
137b7('dul ba): kur ba dang rkun pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o// de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brgyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun kyi ma chos gos 'di ni sra brkyang du mdzad/ 
137b8('dul ba): bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra ba rkyang 'dings par bskos te/ pra brkyang 'dings pa bdag meng 'di shes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'dings par 'gyur ro// 
138a1('dul ba): bting ngo // de skad lan gnyis la na gsung du brjod par bya'o// de nas btIng nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste 'drin ces gnas btan dgongs su gso// chos
138a2('dul ba): gos 'di ni dge 'dun gyis sra ba rkyang ngu mang dul/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sra brkyang 'dings par bsgos pa lags te/ bdag cag gis chos galnga 'dis dge 'dun gyi sro ba rkyang bting lags so zhes
138a3('dul ba): brjod par bya'o// des lags par bteng nga // shin tu btang ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni badrag cag gri yin no zhes brjod par bya zhing de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge'ang
138a4('dul ba): gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par btid dro// shin tu bting ste/ 'di pa rnyed pa dang phran yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// sra brkyang 'dings pa'i dge slong
138a5('dul ba): kis sra brkyang rdzogs te chab thung sar ma yin/ snabs phyi snang ma yin te/ tshad bar du 'jug par mi bya'o// mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o// gal te srong na dar gnas par mi bya'o// sra brkyang 'drangs
138a6('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltung baches po bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug pa ma byed na 'das chabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas phra brgyang 'dings pa'i dge slong gis dpyid na ngab yar byeng
138a7('dul ba): chos bco lnga la yang gi bar bye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sa kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyis spyod chags sa'i chos gapa rnams byin gyis rlabs shig+sa/ del rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyim bzho 'ar bya'o// 
138a8('dul ba): sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa du zhig gi sra brkyang ma bting lags/ nye ba 'khor rdza'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ngas pa dang / dbyad phyi mar gnas
138b1('dul ba): dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / pra brkyang nge 'dengs pa na mngon sum du ma gyur ba'o// gzhan yang 'di rdzi pa bting ba yin te/ slob pa dang / spo bskyed zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa da / 
138b2('dul ba): ba bya spyad pa dag bzab babyed pa ma/ btsun padushig gtad pa mches sa can yon pamachem ldag pa/ nye ba 'thab ste/ dbying kyi ma smin pa dang / dbyang ngam ba dang / dbyar shi mi gdapa pa dom mongs pa dang / 
138b3('dul ba): dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'dangs pa na mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i'o// gnad yang rdza ba 'di dag gi ste/ slob pa dang / spo baspyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba skyo
138b4('dul ba): ba dang / mgu ba dbya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i'o// btsun pa du zhig gi rnyed pa yang ma mchis la phan yon yang ma mchis lags/ nye ba 'khor bI b+he/ ma mthong bas gnas
138b5('dul ba): nas byung ba dang / phyir mi byed pas gnas nas byung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma bor bas gnas nas byung ba dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / dge 'dun byen chos ma yin pa
138b6('dul ba): phyogs pa'i ro// dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ban chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas de dag drim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong
138b7('dul ba): rnamatshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs pa// 'dra ba legs no// reg ba bar byu dang ma/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bde bar spyad pa ni ci 'dra bzhig// 'od gcag ni rlom rkun brnams kyis bcoma'o// 
138b8('dul ba): tshe dang ldadapa dge bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/ gal te sra ba tu byung ni khyed pachos gos kyi bgo bsha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das sa dge
139a1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de sa bsan ngas rjes su gnang / chom rkun bdag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyi sra brgyad dbyung bar bya'o// dbyung ba ni
139a2('dul ba): ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la kaN DI 'ardungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgrol/ dge 'dun thams cad chags shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / 
139a3('dul ba): sring gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun 'thun pas 'di skyed du sra brgyad bting ba las/ dge slong
139a4('dul ba): rab tu mang ba rlos rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags ni/ gas te dge 'dun gyi sa dus la ba bcid bzadrin dge / 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis de
139a5('dul ba): srong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brgyad 'byin par mdzad de// 'di na ga sol pa'o// las ni 'di ltad bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsun du gsol// gnas 'dir
139a6('dul ba): dge 'dun 'thun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags te/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom
139a7('dul ba): rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma
139a8('dul ba): gsung shi// gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzad cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong tshom rkun pa dag nis bcom pa rnams kyis dus brgyang
139b1('dul ba): 'byin par ma du de/ gang gi slad du mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas rnyed pa gang len pa de bgo bar bya/ bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal pa la sa com rkun pa dang bris
139b2('dul ba): btsus pa'i dege slong napas la bzhi pag bya'o// snyam la// del pa dang ni bral pas dang //  pa rnyan no ldan ris dang / nam ma'i seng dus zigs padang// rjes dang the da drungs
139b3('dul ba): ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa chos gos dol bas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa chos gos srog
139b4('dul ba): chags kyis 'tshal ba dang / chos gos chag btab pa dang / chos gos sbyin pa rlabs btab pa dang / chos gos snyan rengs can dang / gas ma'i seng ras gyi chos nas dang / rgyam shes thegs pa da
139b5('dul ba): chos gos rnyings pa dang / chos gos spangs pa dang / chos gos dengs pas sra btang gdeng du rung lags sam/ nye bai 'khor mi nga rje// sngam la// blings dang dus ma yin pa dang // gang zag shin
139b6('dul ba): gos gsug/ mi rung ba dang ma dras dang // klu lngar mchog mi bya dang // blo 'thun min dang mi gding dang // mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor
139b7('dul ba): kyis zhus pa/ btsun pa blings pa'i chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo // btsun pa dus ma lags pa'i chos gos dang / gang zag gi snom snyar dang / 
139b8('dul ba): glags dang mthang gos dang / mi rung ba'i chos gos dang / ma dras pa dang / khru lngar ma mchis pa dang / the 'thun par ma bgyis pa'i chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'ding ba ma bsgos / 
140a1('dul ba): dang / mtshams kyi slad rol tu blo 'thun par bgyes pa'i chos gos kyi sra brkyang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol du bskos pa'i sra brkyang 'dings pas sra brkyang
140a2('dul ba): gding du drang lags saso/ kye ba la khyod ma da // ma sa// ngas kyin de zlab gas// gas pa dang ni btags parted// bongs pa dang ni gso sa// gang zug na
140a3('dul ba): gos gsug/ btsun pa dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra ba kyang gdeng du drung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor rung ngo // btsun pa dgung pa gsum 'das nas dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi
140a4('dul ba): rid pa gang lags pa des sku brgyad gding du drung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor rung ngo // chos zhes sar b.rung ngo // sar pa btags rjod de// phongs pa'i chos gos rlung ngo // gsam
140a5('dul ba): deras snam sbyar mi rung ngo // btsun pa gang zag gi snam sbyar gyis sra brkyang gi deng du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo // bla gos dang
140a6('dul ba): mthang gos kyang de bsnyen na// sdom la// gang zag gi dang khyim pa'i drug// kA lnga pa dang khru wa'i ltag/ blo thun byas pa'i gdang ba dang // mtshams sbyin nyid skye ba'o// btsun
140a7('dul ba): gang zag gi chos gos kyi sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na'o// khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo // gal te dge 'dun la phul
140a8('dul ba): bar gyur na rungango // khru sngabs rung nga // khru lnga la ma lhag parung ngo // blo 'thun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos dang / srang brgyad 'dengs pas rung // mtshams
140b1('dul ba): nang du blo 'thun par byas pa'i sku brkyang gi chos go kyi rung ngo // mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang 'dengs pa bskos pas rung ngo // ma mo brgyad kyi gnyis sra brgyad blang bar gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 
140b2('dul ba): song ba dang / rdzogs pa dang / nges pa dang / nyams pa dang / thos pa dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / re brag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/ song ba'i mtha' can gyis smra
140b3('dul ba): blang ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / 
140b4('dul ba): dazin pa nyid yin no// song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brgyad phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang ba ti leganas nus chos gos ma byas chos ga sa zin par chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs
140b5('dul ba): phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba de'i nis de ba'i mtha' can k+She sru rkyang byung ba yin no// rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra
140b6('dul ba): bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas phyir 'ong nang chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdage slar ma 'ong ste
140b7('dul ba): 'od kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sa brgyang phyung ba yin no// nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brgyad phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong skyab rgyung bting
140b8('dul ba): gnas nas tshosags byam ches gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du yod nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos 'is kyang mebya
141a1('dul ba): snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can bye pra brkyang phyung ba yin no// nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba
141a2('dul ba): gnas nas chos gos mi byas chos gos ma zin par 'tshams kyi phyi rol du dong nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos kyang
141a3('dul ba): 'o snyam nas/ des de rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang / nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge
141a4('dul ba): sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ongs te sh+lo bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pa sna sra brkyang phyung
141a5('dul ba): des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin du phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba
141a6('dul ba): yin no// mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par phyir 'ongs ma mi 'ong snyam de la
141a7('dul ba): mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni mtshams 'das pa pa'i sku brkyang phyung ba yin no// re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang ne na/ 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos
141a8('dul ba): koso ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de'i chos gos rib gang yin pa de thams cad du chad pa de'i ni re thag cha
141b1('dul ba): ba ba'i grub rkyang byung ba yin no// brgyad pa sra brgyang snang ba nyid gang zhe na/ 'dis ste dge slongs brgyad bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos pa byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol dus
141b2('dul ba): ba las de yang slar 'ongs shing sra 'argyar phyung ba nyams su myong ba ded don brgyad pa rma brkyang byung ba nyid yin no// / sdom la// ma byas pa ni te shu dang // brnams pa dag ni nyi shu da // rab
141b3('dul ba): ba nyi shu dang // re ba med pa nyi shu gcig/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par 'tshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos
141b4('dul ba): bya'o snyam pa las de 'dri snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'od med kyi 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyisra brgyad byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra ba rgyang
141b5('dul ba): bting ba'i gnag nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas rmar 'od zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ skar me 'od nyid chos gos
141b6('dul ba): bya'o/ das bde ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas ches gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas
141b7('dul ba): 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las des de rtsom zhid de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas
141b8('dul ba): chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun 'thun pa
142a1('dul ba): sra brgya phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shed nga shes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni bos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra btung phyung ba yin no// 
142a2('dul ba): 'di lta ste dge slong sra ba chung ba ting ba'i gnas nas rgyas gos ma byas chos gos mazin par mtshams kyi phyir ma du songo nas slar 'di zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de dar song nas
142a3('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba len no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra nga rkang bting ba'i gnas nas cho
142a4('dul ba): byas chos gros mazin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de der song nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam
142a5('dul ba): ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar
142a6('dul ba): dang chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ de dring song nas tsam ning dro byams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' nan gyis pargyad byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sa pa stong bting ba'i gas
142a7('dul ba): sa chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la dge 'dun 'thun pa
142a8('dul ba): sra brkyang phyung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin du phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rangab byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba yin no// 'od
142b1('dul ba): dge slong su 'byung bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ob zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las de 'di snyam du dems
142b2('dul ba): slar ma 'ong zhing ron kyang rgyas gos bya'osnyam pa de ldan rdzogs pa'i mthu' ldan gyis baN+Di dbyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sru ba chung bting ba'i gnas nas cho mgos mi
142b3('dul ba): sa ma byin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas skar 'o ba ning rje se gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de dang sod nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong nang chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam
142b4('dul ba): pade'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting bar gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slara'i
142b5('dul ba): chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ des de rtse ma zhing de brtsams pa nyam pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brgyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra
142b6('dul ba): pa'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma byin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du sod nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o zhes sems la bzlog pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang
142b7('dul ba): nga la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyud do zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par byung ngo // shin du phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang bar byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha'
142b8('dul ba): sra brkyang byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos mthon par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos
143a1('dul ba): yi no// 'di la skyed ge slong sa rgyang gti gan nas rgyas gis ma thus ches smras mayin par mdzums kyi phyi rol dus nas spang ba shi gyis gos d+ha nas mya ni/ 
143a2('dul ba): deder song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ blar mi 'od zhid chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i nings pa'i ma dzin gyi bcu byung ba yinan// 'di sa skyed dge slong du nga
143a3('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas kyis kyisas byas chos gas mkhyen par mtshams ci nam du mdunas slar 'ang shi chos gas byan nas sems su nag pa las/ dede seMng nas kyis ni
143a4('dul ba): rnams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brgya byung ba yin no// 'di saste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos shes ma byas chos gos mnan
143a5('dul ba): du ma nas smrar mi shing chos pas ldanan rnamapa sbyin sa/  na ldan pas smra / ladas 'dun rdzun pa nas cu byu dang / 
143a6('dul ba): nas kyid legs par byung //  stong shes dus smra rung bar bya pa 'i tsun nas du nan/  ste ni ts+tshong
143a7('dul ba): nas chos gsas kyis chas gas mtshan pa sa sa kyi kyi ma du na sri na rgyas nas bya// ni pa mal la bag / den sa nas 'did ma
143b1('dul ba): te/ slar ma 'ong ste ron kyang chos gos pa'i snyam pa de'i na rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sru brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bti ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma bya
143b2('dul ba): sa gos ma rin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos shes bya'o// zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der seng nas 'di snyam du sems te/ srar
143b3('dul ba): deng ros zhes kyang mi bya'o// snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge sbyong sra brkyang bteng ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma zin ches gos ma byas
143b4('dul ba): par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o// zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ des der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha
143b5('dul ba): can gyi sra brkyang byung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhi
143b6('dul ba): chos gos bya'o// zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brgyang du phyung ngo zhes thos so// zas nas kyang
143b7('dul ba): legs par phyung ngo // shin du phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas na
143b8('dul ba): chos gos ma byas chos gos mi zin par ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems
144a1('dul ba): srar phrar 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gas ni bya'o// snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyisra brgya phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang
144a2('dul ba): bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma bya' chos gos mazin par ci slar 'ong dba'an te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom pa bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/ de 'das
144a3('dul ba): besems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
144a4('dul ba): gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las/ des dartsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa
144a5('dul ba): de'i ni nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sa brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngamatshan
144a6('dul ba): teslar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhe na mtshams kyi phyi rol du sar pa las/ dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang byung
144a7('dul ba): zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo // shin du phyung ngo zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang byung ba yin no// 'di
144b1('dul ba): stedage slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma than par mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'ong nas zhes bya ba thams cad brjod par bya'o// don kyang snga ma
144b2('dul ba): shul ni chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par zhes bya'o// 'dir ni chos gos ma zin pa zhes bya ba bor te/ chos gos brtsams pa zhes bya ba bcug ste rnam pa 'dis nyi shu pa
144b3('dul ba): gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos go ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam
144b4('dul ba): ba'i re ba yod pa la sa de 'di snyam du sems te/ skar mi 'ong ste 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o// snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ ra
144b5('dul ba): da pa shes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang gting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin
144b6('dul ba): bar slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ skam pa'i re ba med par mtshams kyi phyi rol du song ba las de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang
144b7('dul ba): chos gos de bya'o// snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi phra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba med pa zhes bya ba'i khyad bar 'dis snga ma bzhin
145a1('dul ba): nyi nub gzhan bya'o// sngams/ bya bdag de 'acu gnyis dang // btsal ba dngan de bzhin gsas// yul la lngar me pa ste// gan la 'a ma yin no// 'd-i saste/ 
145a2('dul ba): dge slong su 'byung bting ba'i gnas nas kyis gas ma byas chosngags mayin par bya zhogs mtshams mase ma bang nas yang 'a ni chos gas te skal ba las nam du / ma
145a3('dul ba): na kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra ba tung phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bteng ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos mgrin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi
145a4('dul ba): rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'dre snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong shing chos gos kyang pi bya'o snyam pa de'i ni nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra bkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra
145a5('dul ba): btu bting ba'i gnas nas chos kos ma byas chos gos ma smin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi pha rol du song nas sgyur 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o snyam pa la pra/ des de rtsol zhing de brtsams pa las nyams pa
145a6('dul ba): ri'i ni nyams pa mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phrang pa yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas ni sachos gos pa byas chos shes pa zin par bya bzhi ga la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'od ning
145a7('dul ba): chos gos bya'o snyam pa las dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phyung la des dge 'dun 'thun pas sra brkyang phung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang legs par byung ngo // shin du phyung ngo nas rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i
145a8('dul ba): thos pa'i mapa can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra btung bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'dzin ma'i
145b1('dul ba): na pa pa lab/ dang ma nas 'disnya ma dusams/ spang ba'ang lta'on kyang rdzas gas na bya'os par ldan rdzogs pa ma' can gyi slab rkyang byung ba yin no// deng sa dranas zhes bya ba'i byed par 'dis rdzog
145b2('dul ba): pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa de lta ba bzhin ring pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' ca na yang de bzhin no// 'di lta ste dge slong phrab rgyang btid pa'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas
145b3('dul ba): kos ma zin par bya ba zhig gi ched la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas ci slar 'ong ma 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za 'alas/ de 'di snyam du sems te slar mi 'ong ste 'od kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de
145b4('dul ba): rdoklas pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brgya gang ba yin no// sems su me tsom za bas rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gdungs pa ji lta bar nges pa'i nges pa'i mtha' can dang / rnams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i dang 'aldan pa
145b5('dul ba): shin no// 'di lta ste dge slong sra brkyang ba ting ba'i gnas nas mos gos pa byas chos gos ma zin par btsal bzhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ang zhing thos gos bya'o snyam pa las de 'di skam du sems
145b6('dul ba): ba kyi kyis kyi gas pa ni rdzogs padi mapa med kyis cang byu ba yid//  pa sa rnam na du gnyis na /  sa myed hU~M
145b7('dul ba): nyid 'i ga nas chos gos ma byam tshos shes pa rin par sla 'i 'ong bar yul ltar mamamapa kyi phyir la song ba de'i na sang ba'i ma dun gyi srab d+ma byung po yin no// di sa myed ge snang slob tu btid 'i
145b8('dul ba): dam mos gosas byas chos gos ma yin par yul ltar mtshams kyi phyi rol du ba nas kyi slar 'od dam 'on te slang mi 'o nas sems la the tshom rab las de'odi snyam du sems te blang ma zang pon kyang chos go
146a1('dul ba): // skam pa de'i ni rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra ba rgyang phyung ba yin te/ nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no// yul lta ba'i ldang lta bar gnas
146a2('dul ba): ba'i lnga yang de bzhin no// sra brgyang dge gni rdzogs te// 'dul ba gas/ bam po drug cu brgyad ga/ ko kak+ki'i gzhi'i sdom me/ ko sham+b+hi ni mab krol gyi// dge slong cad pa snatshogs dang// gre ni dang rtsod
146a3('dul ba): byed pa dang // ring po len gyi spyod pa dang // ngan spong lan tshwa kha ba dang // srungs dang tshal stug glang chen dang // ma 'gags pas ni nges byas dang // mnyan yod du ni zhi bar byas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kau sham+bi'i
146a4('dul ba): dbyangs ldan gyi kun dga' re ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshi kau sham+bI'i dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma me 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang ba
146a5('dul ba): yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mad sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin ga mamo 'dzin pa yin no// sangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo rje 'dzin pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin
146a6('dul ba): pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul pa 'dzin gam mo 'don pa yin no// de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing so
146a7('dul ba): ba dang ko sham+b+hi byin te/ delam gyis dub par ba bsos nas kau shA tI'i dge slong gi drung du song ste phyin pa dang / phan tshun so so yang dag par dga' la byas nas mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa rnams gtan pa
146a8('dul ba): dbang par brtsayas te/ de nas gcig gis smrab pa/ mad sde 'di ni 'di skad du gdan par bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni 'di yin no// gcig shos kyis smras pa/ mdo sde 'di ni de skad du gdon par mi bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i
146b1('dul ba): de 'di'i bayin no//  ba'i ni rigs so// khyod ci ni mi rigs so// raba'i ni 'brel ba yin no// khyod kyi ni 'brel pa ma yin na nas de gnyis pan tshun du ma mthun par gyur nas kau sha m+bI'i dge slong gis yangs bcan
146b2('dul ba): ge slong la gla da ka btsal ba klur len cing 'dug go// dge 'dun gyis kyang 'di lta su khrims su 'char ba byas te/ gang gis smras kyi bus ba cu bslebab pa dang / nyung ba dab cu med pa mthong ba nas rgyas bkang ste gnasu
146b3('dul ba): zhan du gzhag par bya ba 'am/ dge bskos la khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o// gal te bdag nyid kyis ma bkang ngam dge bsgos la ma bsgos par gyur na de ni ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyi
146b4('dul ba): de bdag cig gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'chags su bzhug go zhes byas so// ji tsam khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdu gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de na dge slong latsham
146b5('dul ba): bas la dong // kha cig ni 'gro bar chas so// yangs pa can gyi dge slong khrus kyi bum pa blangs nas snams phyi sar zhugs pa dang / de'i stan cig gnas pas rings ri ngas ltar 'ongs nas sgra phyung ba/ mkhan po dge slong
146b6('dul ba): cheg ni zas la dod lags so// kha cig ni 'dod bar chas kyis tshur spron bzhud do// de dang lhan cig grus kyi bum pa gnas gcig tu bzhag ste chas so// kau sha m+bI'i dge slong de yang phyin med nyid du phyin pa dang / den
146b7('dul ba): yangs ba can ci dge slong des khrus kyi bum pa blangs te gtsug lag yang du 'dug par bsams pa dang lhan cig gnas pas smras pa/ mkhan po gar bzhud/ des smras pa/ bu 'o ba la klo sha m+b+hi dag slong 'di zlad/ 
146b8('dul ba): tshol bas khrus kyi bum pa 'gengs su 'gro'o// ci 'di thams cad kyi thams cad du stong ngam/ thams cad kyi thams cad du stong pa la yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang chu 'dis chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so// mkhan
147a1('dul ba): thams cad du stongs par mgyur pas 'tshal te/ bdag cag ni mkhan pa'i phyogs dang / dpung dang / grogs bgyid pa sngags kyi tung skyon bzhud do// des de nyid du banag nas de dang ldan ceg/ 
147a2('dul ba): shAm+bI'i dge slong gis mthong nas khrus kyi bum pa de la sanams so// de nas mi bzod pa skyes te mjal te zhes byas nas khrus kyi bus pa bkang kyai chu'i bya ba byas nas sang nga// de nus zan zes nas dge slong
147a3('dul ba): ge dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / dge slong rnams la bsgrags pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa can gyi dge slong des dge 'dun gyi nang khrims dral to// de nas rga na rims ji lta ba bzhin du
147a4('dul ba): gdung ba byas nas rim gyis de'i drung du son pa dang / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa skabs phye shig/ ltung ba rigs lnga la skabs phye'o// khyod pa de dang ltung ba byung gis ltung ba yang slar chos bzhin du byis shing / 
147a5('dul ba): ma mthong ngo // dge 'dun gyi khrims su bca' ba gang gis khrus kyi bum bcu 'gribs pa dang / chu nyung ba dang / chu med pa mthong na bdag nyid kyis chus bkang ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba
147a6('dul ba): dge bskos la tshe dang ldan pa lus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug ga shes bsgo bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bkang la dge bskos pa yang ma bskon de ne ma gus pa yin te/ mgus pa'i phyir de bdag cag
147a7('dul ba): ltung byed kyi klung pa 'chags su gzhug go zhes bca' pa ma yin nas/ des smras pa/ dwe ha cang stong pa ma yin no// stong par mgur kyang rung ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so// des cang me smra bar 'dug
147a8('dul ba): 'i dge slong nig/ gaN+DIn gnyugam pa dang 'khor mang po yin pas das del nan gyis gnas nas byung ba'i las byas pa dang / sangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas de nan/ 
147b1('dul ba): da slong na gas dnga'arab bral dang / tshang 'dru ba dag / cang pa dang / 'byed pa byung 'du gyur te/ bde lta ste ltung ba byung ba na'am/ ltung ba ma bya rozhe 'am/ gnas nas phyung ba yin no sha'am/ gnas nas phyung
147b2('dul ba): ma yin no zhes gang yang ltung ba byung ba dang / ltung ba med pa dang / gnas nas dbyung ba dang / gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin pa la gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa de ni chos ma yin pa las 'khrugs pa gzhag par
147b3('dul ba): 'os pas phyung ngo zhes pa'i skab pa de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge
147b4('dul ba): spong na pas dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste de skyed ces bga' sum to// dge slong dag khyed 'thab kros dang mtshang lbu ba dang /  pa dang / rgya
147b5('dul ba): byung nas/ 'di lta ste ltung ba byung dri na 'am zhes bya ba nas 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma benan du ste bden nas/ btsun pa mad lags so// dge slong dag 'thab krol ba byed cig/ mtshang ma thang
147b6('dul ba): / khyod /  'tha~Md ci/ gnan yangangs panas nas byung ba dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos pa 'a bar b+h+yas/ dge gnas nas byung bas 'di snyam dumams bskyed par bya'o// gnas dang sbyin
147b7('dul ba): pa'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ de'i glegs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa pha rol gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul
147b8('dul ba): 'dzin pa/ ma me 'dzin pa yin te/ gal te bdag gis ltung ba che bzhin du slar ma byas na des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / mtshar 'dru ba dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyis/ mal
148a1('dul ba): / bdag gi bsung babyor chos bzhin bya'o// gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis kun du spod pa'i chos de ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
148a2('dul ba): po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas blang ba'i dge slong de/ gan nas su pa'i rjes su rdzogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / klan nas snang ba'i rjes su spyod ma pa yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams
148a3('dul ba): / zeng bstod nas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams
148a4('dul ba): ponyas bkug ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'du ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas 'khrugs pa gzhag
148a5('dul ba): mA 'os pas zhes bya pa'i bar gongs bzhin du ste bdan tsam btsun 'amang lags so// ge slong drug 'thab grol ma na cig/ mtshar ma 'bru shig/ man+do cig/ ma babyed ci// gzhan yang ngas gnasan
148a6('dul ba): 'byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dag thong gnas nas 'byin pa 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong 'di ni gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ 
148a7('dul ba): snga 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa ma mo 'dzin pa yin la 'di'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa pha rol gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin te/ gal te
148a8('dul ba): bdag gis de la mi 'dod pa glengs sam/ dran par byas na des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / 'gyed pa byed pas gnas par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di la mi 'dud
148b1('dul ba): gled par mi na pard me bya'o// banas nas byin pa'i dge stong gis kun du spyong ba'i chos ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs/ na
148b2('dul ba): sa sa sa ces bka' ma pa/ 'an kyang da nga rnam 'a gas dang / mcha 'brub pa cod pad /  byung pa byung bas gnas shing gas la ya
148b3('dul ba): pa byed pa'i skabs de nga rnamasu kyang kyi ldan legs padang / nas brtsam na dus kyis gnas nas drung ba'i dge sbyo na pa 'anas nas pa'i ma phyogs pa'i
148b4('dul ba): dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams phonas bkug ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag khyed langs de srod ces bka' stsol kyang 'thab kyi dang
148b5('dul ba): ub dag nod pa /  skyed pa byung bas gnas shing / da du gas sto sa yang gso slong ma yin par byed pa ban nam/ btsun pa ma lags so//  seM dgra'atha na cig / mtsha ma'adu shig/ mdzod
148b6('dul ba): cig/ ma 'byed cig/ dge slong dag khyed cug thab bral dang / ma char 'bru ba dang / rtso pa dag/ 'gyed pa 'byung zhing gnas nas las su bya ba dang dag yin pa gso sbyong dang / dag ba byed dra / gsol bdas / 
148b7('dul ba): bdang shAzhi sa dang/  la pa dang lan ses byes pa gru sa byed ge slong de rnams su rnams du byed du gnas pa gyu //  ci na/ 
148b8('dul ba): slong dag gnyis pa 'di dag ri tha dad par gnas pa yin te/ gang 'ang bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang / ga zhi ga dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o// 
149a1('dul ba): khye nas bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song su phyin pa dang 'asod snyoms mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug sa
149a2('dul ba): chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so sa yang dag par dga' bar mjed de/ dge slong gcig dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga bsod pa'i kha
149a3('dul ba): tshim par byas sam zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dka' bar mdzad pa 'das sas yang dag par dge'i bar mdzad de/ dge
149a4('dul ba): ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa med par dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas bsod pas tshim par bgyis na/ 'on kyang rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge sme
149a5('dul ba): rnams drum pa'i nang du 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'brub dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byur nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhes 'am zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du
149a6('dul ba): de ni phan kun du dag pa la zhugs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug
149a7('dul ba): ga khang du zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom
149a8('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed khabs la khyim du zhugs pan/ 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'brub dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed pa byung bar gyur nas 'di lta ste lung
149b1('dul ba): nga nas 'ab zhes bya ba nas don pan tshun du dag ga mazhugs so// zhes bya ba'abang du bdan nas/ btsun pa mang lags so// dge slong dga' ma krol babyo cid/ tsang ba 'du shig/  cad cog/ 
149b2('dul ba): / gzhan ga ngas rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bcu' bar bya ste/ rgol ba dang pi rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs
149b3('dul ba): spyod pa rung ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i skabs mi 'byung bar bsten par chad yod par 'dug par bya'o// rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas kun
149b4('dul ba): dpa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'ga' tshangs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs na/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang
149b5('dul ba): ku dang / cod padang / 'byed pa byung bas gnas pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsas pa/ dge slong dag
149b6('dul ba): la byed cig/ mtshangs 'du shig/ ma rtsod rig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag khyer cag 'tha bkrol dang / mtshang 'brub dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed pa byung bas gnas na rtsod pa byung zhing dbyung 'atsun pa
149b7('dul ba): 'dun pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang / nye bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di med do// dge slong dag khyed nag 'thab krol med pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang / 'byed
149b8('dul ba): tung cing gnas na cod pa byung nang byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang / de bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di yod do// dge slong dag spor blang ba jal ba shi'i
150a1('dul ba): // bdan dang kyis bdag nyid pa dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'dreg ste/ dge slong dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'brub dang / rtsod pa dang / bgyed pa byung ni dbyugs
150a2('dul ba): phyogs gzhan du gnas pan ched du bsams te chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su 'grub ste/ de// ku ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid bdad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun gyi
150a3('dul ba): chos kyis brdeg pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / phyir mi byed pa dang / sdin bcur gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor ba gnas nas phyung ba ste/ 'di ni dge 'dun
150a4('dul ba): chos kyis yin no// dge slong dag gnyis pa 'di dag ni 'thun par gnas pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhan/ gang dag bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid 'thun pa'i gnas su 'azhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyi
150a5('dul ba): chos kyis bzhag pa'o// bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid 'thun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhen/ dge slong dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshar 'bru ba dang / rtso pa dang / bgyed pa byung zhing phyogs gzhan
150a6('dul ba): gnas pan ched du bsams te/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs nas chos kyi phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ 'di na bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid 'thun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no// dge 'dun gyis chos kyis ban
150a7('dul ba): grang nin/ 'di lta ste dge 'dun gyes pa mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa dang / phyir ma byed pa dang / sdig bcan gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dir ba gnas nas byung ba 'byin pa ni dge 'dun gyis chos
150a8('dul ba): // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas nas pa 'i'i dge slong da/ gnas nas byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i ni srid rnams dang / gnang nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa
150b1('dul ba): dpa gzang bstad nas// gnas nas 'khyen pa'i dre / grong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su byadapa par dag slad rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams
150b2('dul ba): bkug nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dgangs de skad ces bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang byed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'byed pa phyung bas gnas shing / dadung gso sbyong la yang
150b3('dul ba): de pa bden nas/ btsun pa mang lags so zhes pa bA nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / rjod pa dang / 'byed pa
150b4('dul ba): bas gnas so zhes bya ba 'bar gong ma bzhin du'o// khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dong ngo // 
150b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs te bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bskyabs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku ska
150b6('dul ba): da par mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba nas skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bza' bar banod nas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi skus
150b7('dul ba): dbang mad da de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// den nol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams byas kyi phyid kyi khyenang du 'gas pa dang 'thab krol dang / ma tshang 'brub dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed pa byung
150b8('dul ba): rnam par gyur te/ 'di sa ste ltung ba byung ba zhes bya ba nas gzhug par 'os pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de ni bin tshun rdeg par zhugs so// de nas dge slong 'bod malas nod pas bsod
151a1('dul ba): rgyal ma tshangs byed zhes bya ba dang / yul gas ma'i rgyal ba ring po min gnyis phan tshun du rtsod par gyur te/ rgyas pa ni lung brda ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i me ru las ring po la
151a2('dul ba): 'byung ba bzhin no// de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces// tshangs sbyin rga ba sdug bsngal te// nor rnams yongs su btugs pa dang // gzhan rnams kyang nim
151a3('dul ba): mthang dang // yul gnad shi ba sdug bsngal lo// zhes bka' stsal pa zhig kyang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs sa bcad de bka' stsal pa/ tshig pa mthun la phyogs/ 
151a4('dul ba): mas yang // 'di gtso min zhes sems byed pa// dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur na go// mthu chung cung zad cis mi bsam// srog chags rus pa gcog pa dang // rta dang ba lang nor phrogs dang // yul/ 
151a5('dul ba): 'khor phung bar byas rnams kyang // 'dum par 'gyur ba nyid yad na// chos 'di rnam par shes byung ba// khyed cag ci yi phyir mi 'gyur// spyod yul ston par byed pa'i gsung // chags las skye
151a6('dul ba): pa lhur len pa// brtags nas mkhas par snang ba ni// gang la rtsod pa des mi shes// gzhan yang bdag cag nyid la ri// brtson zhes bya bar mi shes kyi// gang dag gis ni 'di shes pa/ 
151a7('dul ba): delag nub me dgas so// bdag smos pa dge bar byas dang // bdag tshul bdag ni phab myur pa// de la gang dag khad 'dzin pa// de dag g.yon zhi 'i 'gyur// bdag smos bdag la kha
151a8('dul ba): dang // bdag rgyal bdag ni phar gyur pa// de la gang dag khor mi 'dzin// de dag sha kho na rab zhir 'gyur// 'khon du 'dzin pas sha kho na dag/ 'dir ni gzharo la zhi mi 'gyur/ 
151b1('dul ba): bzod pas sha 'khon zhi 'gyur ba// 'di ni g.yung drung chos yin no// 'khon du 'dzin pas sha 'a khon dam yang ni pi 'gyur// don du 'dzin med rnams kyis sha kho na zhi bar 'gyur// 'khon la chags pa
151b2('dul ba): yus can rnams la phan mi 'gyur// de lta ba na 'a khas pa lan du 'dzin mi byed// gral ta grogs po 'grus skyong ldan cig spyod pa dang // legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par gyur ni ni// zag par/ 
151b3('dul ba): 'gyur ba thams cad zil gyi sa yan na byas nas// de dang yid dga' den dang ldan bzhin spyad par bya// gal te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan cig spyod pa dang // 
151b4('dul ba): gyur na// rgyal pos yul 'khor rgya chen spangs par gyur pa bzhin// gcig pu 'dug par bya zhing sdig pa rabs mi bya// gal te btsal te bdag 'dra ba 'am// lhag par rnyed par ma gyur// 
151b5('dul ba): skyes pa stongs por 'gyur ba dbas// gcig pur spyad pa brtan par spyad// gcig phur spyad pa lags 'byor gyi// byis pa bstangs pa lags min pas// ma tang dgon pa'i glang mer ltar// sems
151b6('dul ba): las bsnyungs te gcig pus spyad// da skad ces bka' snyam pa dang / ko sham+bI'i dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rjelags/ bde bAr
151b7('dul ba): shegs pa ni chos kyi rje lags na/ 'di rnams bdag cag la tshig ngan pa dang mi snyan pa ma chin/ bdag cag gis de rnams pa ci'i slad du bzod par bgyi lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra
151b8('dul ba): dod de rnams kyi spyod tshul dang / log par sgrub pa des thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab pas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las gshegs te/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rga zhing gshegs
152a1('dul ba): sa kyis rgyu dang gra shegs pa dang mnyan med skyo nas mnyan yang kyi rgyal bu rgyal rje tshal mdon med pa sa sbyin kyi kun dga' bar bcug pas// bcom ldan 'das der
152a2('dul ba): gshegs pa dang / kau sha m+bI'i dge slong rnams dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'di lta bu'i spyod lam du gyur te/ sgo dro na pas kye phyid bsod snyoms la 'jug/ zas kyi reg tun sgo bcad
152a3('dul ba): nas 'thab mo 'gyed par gyur to// de rnams tshul dang spyod pa dang log par sgrub pa des lo bcu gnyis 'das so// ke sham+bI'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams mdud khang du 'dus nas phan tshun gros
152a4('dul ba): bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / spun skad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dbul
152a5('dul ba): bar shin tu dad na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod yul 'di lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du spangs te dung yang ma byon no// kha gcig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das 'di
152a6('dul ba): gshegs pa dgal 'gyur/ 'di na da ster kr-i ga N+DI'i dge slong rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa 'di lta bur byed de/ sra dro rjes kyi phyir bsod sems la zhugs la zas kyi
152a7('dul ba): rab tu slo bcad na 'thab mo 'byed de// kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag de rnams la zhes pa yod pa 'i yin gyi/ 'on kyang bdag cag gis ldan te bdag cag gisad rnams lnga bsod
152a8('dul ba): ma byin pa'am cheg smras pas so// tshur bdag cag gis khrim sa bcas la bzhag sa/ sa kyang de rnams la ba med smram pa mi sbyin zhing tshig kyang mi sgra zhes rnams skyes
152b1('dul ba): ngoms su Nas nas bzhag // denas bya de nyin nog shi'i dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / sras kyang ma smras pa 'bad rnams kyang ma byin// de rnams ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus
152b2('dul ba): banyid kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa da ltar 'akrus pa nyid kyis skror byu ste ba sod soms gcig sdang 'arnyed do// dranas de dmas 'dus nas kau sham+b+hi'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la smras pa
152b3('dul ba): shes ldan dag re shig nang zad par gyur pas bsod skams mi ster ba ni rigs na/ bdag cag gis ni zhes pa ci byas na tshil kyang mi ster/ de rnams kyis sbas pa/ gang dag gis tshul dang
152b4('dul ba): smod pa dang log par sgrub bAs ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma ba' nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la gshegs te/ la bcu gnyis 'das nas da dung yang slar ma gshegs par
152b5('dul ba): cag kyang shAkya'i bris kyi dge slong yin par bdag nyid kha sa 'cha'am/ rnams cad mi smra bar 'khod nas/ de rnams kyi drung nas dong ste smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag da
152b6('dul ba): rnams kyis bdag cag brgyad pa ni thog tu bab ste/ gang nigasal 'gyem pa de nyid lngas bter te sdang bas mdor na mnyan med du dang la/ bcom ldan 'angs dang dag sa
152b7('dul ba): gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol lo// de nas kau sham+bI'i dge slong rnams de nyid kyi nub ma 'das nas lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te/ kau sham+b+hir mthu/ 
152b8('dul ba): par mnyan yod gang na ba der rku shing dong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kau sha mI'i dge slong 'thab kral byed pa/ mtshang 'dru ba byed la cod par byed pa 'gyed par byed pa/ 
153a1('dul ba): tshan gagags gag sas da sa/ 'an na da da ga / 
153a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan pa der seng sa phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag tsha pa te/ phyogs nicin tu 'dug go// phyags gcig
153a3('dul ba): 'dug nas tsha dang ldan pa kun dag pos bcom ldan 'das la'adi ste ces gsom to// btsun pa bdag gis go sha m+bu dge slong 'bra ba krol bgyid pa/ mtshang la rjin gcod par bgyi pa/ byed pa bgyidag
153a4('dul ba): bgyi pa rnams 'dir mtshol zhes mos lags te/ gang dgagis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs byung bar 'byis te/ 'di byon paded ga ngo cham mchis pas tho brtsam pa nyid du bdag cag la gleng par babyed/ dran par
153a5('dul ba): / de rnams la bdag cag gis de ltar bsgrub par brtse/ kun dga' bod dag pa dge slong nams kyis la gapangs gnas ma ldam ma nig bldan pa ma gtogs par gtam 'dri bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar po bya/ blta bar
153a6('dul ba): debya/ rnam par bska bar mi bya'o// gal te bdag caganan nan/ ci byed na gnas la sa pam sbyin zhes blan/ gang dag gi tshul dang spyod dang / yin par sgrub pas ston drugs med byes shing rjegasal mo ba na
153a7('dul ba): 'dredi ga shegs pa skyed cag kya ga kya'i sras kyi dge sbyong min par bdag nyid khas 'che'am/ spyan pa jug 'ardzunan des 'dig dang pa nyid kyang bye dbang bar mi 'gyur ri nas spros shig/ skyed bu'i bdag ma chen mo go/ 
153a8('dul ba): mi gag 'i dge slong sa grol byed ga mchar 'thubar byed pa/ cod par byed pa 'byed par byed de/ tshod pa'i gami byed pa rnams 'ong nas thos so// thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ yong la de rnams ladas
153b1('dul ba): te'i di yang bsgrub par bya bcom ldan 'das la mnas bcom ldan 'das bdan pa de ya byin pa ma ldan 'das kya zhabs gnyis paman pa 'dran tsham daphyogs cag tu 'dugag/ phyogs / 
153b2('dul ba): du 'dug das bcom ldan 'das la skye dgu'i bdag mi chen ma so tamI sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcu dang padag / gis kau tsang+gA dge slo 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dra bar 'gyud pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'arkyang par babyed
153b3('dul ba): rtsod pa'i gzhi basbyin pa rnams mchi 'onas pas lags na/ bdag gis de rnams pang ltung bslab par nga rtsi/ ga ta skyon ces ga shi 'i dge slong rnams pa 'khor kye gai ma yin pas ma ngongom thag stan dang nga ma ga / 
153b4('dul ba): bdag pa 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par sla bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya'o// khyim bdag mgon med pas sbyin kyis kau sham+bI'i dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/ mtshang yu bar byed pa/ cod par byed pa 'byed/ 
153b5('dul ba): bar byed pa rjod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ongs nas thos so// thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ song la de rnams la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya bcom ldan 'das la rnga'o snyam du bsims nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
153b6('dul ba): nabader song nga khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi napas gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phogs cig tu 'dun no// phyags cig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mazhen med zas spyan gyis bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces
153b7('dul ba): gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis gau sha ste'i dge slong rdza krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'drub babyed pa/ rjod phyi pa/ 'byed pang brjid pa/ byed pa'i ga zhi btsud pa rnams mchi lo zhes thos lags na/ bdag gis de na
153b8('dul ba): pa shAr bsgrub par bgyi/ khyis ngad na gyim da gti dge slong nam sa sbyin pa dang me bathun pa med pas pasan sgoms ni sbyin gyi/ gtam 'dri ba mi bya/ thebs par smra'ar sa bya/ parga bar mi bya'o/ nas
154a1('dul ba): bar bag par mi bya'o// de nas kaun m+bu'i dge slong rnapas rim gyis mnyan med du phyin nas/ de dkrung ba da dang chos gong mkhas su ba bsu rkang ba bkrus nas dras pa/ gnas mapa 'gadabs
154a2('dul ba): yin/ phyag chang dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bi lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga ngan pa der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag
154a3('dul ba): cag la gnas mal byin cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de rnams la lag 'ardas gnas mal tha ma zhig bstan par brtsams pa dang de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bdag cag rgan pa yin na ci
154a4('dul ba): bye bdag cag la gnas mal tha ma dag sbyin/ des smras pa// khyed cag sdang shA mra'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par zhes bya ba nas de yang khyed dbang par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rnams yi chad cing
154a5('dul ba): sdug bsngal bas mtshan mo 'dang bar byed do// de nas gnas nas srung ba'i dge slong gis nam gyi tshe smad kyi dus su rang gi klud la brtags nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang
154a6('dul ba): rjod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di la ste lung 'byung ga / su ba 'byung ngan 'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dag ni lung ba mabyung ba ma yin te lung 'byung ba yin
154a7('dul ba): gnas nas med byung ba ma min ta ga nas na me byung ba yin la// gnas nas byung ba gang yin 'a yang chos dang thun pa'i las ma 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas byung gis/ mis bdag gis thun pa'i sum
154a8('dul ba): kyi ga da ma ma man shi na chu ma tshwa mas /  kru sa kyis sem sa rgyags rnams can sa
154b1('dul ba): sa gnas nas spang ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang gnas nas rba ba'i rjes su phyo la se na sa phyogs pa rnams la 'di ska ces smras so// tshadang ldan pa dang 'di dang su nas kyi maslad kyi dus su bdag
154b2('dul ba): pa shi rgyud la brtags na 'di snyal du sems te/ gleng gzhi gang las 'thab kra sa dang / mtshad yu ba dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa par nas 'di lta ste lhung ba byung po na'am/ ltung ba mabyung ngo na ma/ gnas nas dbyung
154b3('dul ba): ltung ba mthung ba ma yin te lung ba byung ba yin nang gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma yin te gnas nas dbyung ba yin la/ gnas nas byung ba gang yin pa yang ches dang 'thun 'pha
154b4('dul ba): 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung gis/ mal bdag gis 'thun par sdums bya'o snyam na khyed cag tsi smra/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong dang / ga
154b5('dul ba): das byung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams nga/ gnang nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i das
154b6('dul ba): rnams dang / gnasu nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gangan bded de cu byed nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams da
154b7('dul ba): gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags na 'di skarang
154b8('dul ba): sems te/ gleng gzhi gang mas 'am kros dang / mtshad yur gyur nas zhes bya ba nas/ 'dun pa sdums bya sems nazhes bya ba'i bar ba pa bzhin du/ rkyed cag ci ste/ ni rnams kyis sras g.yen
155a1('dul ba): byas da shin du byar// gan nasazung ba nagayang da/ dan nan tugs rdzas su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rdzas duphyogs pa yang ngas su phyogs pa
155a2('dul ba): nams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das gang
155a3('dul ba): na de dngas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yanas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das
155a4('dul ba): btsun pa 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis ring sa rgyud la btags na 'di snyam du lems te nas bya ba nas 'thun par sdums bgyi bar zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
155a5('dul ba): zhin du ste bdag gis dge slong 'di dag thams cad la 'thun par bgyi bar spro bar bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag legs so legs so// 
155a6('dul ba): rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshar 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed 'byung bas gnas shing / phyogs dang phyogs gzhan la gnas la mA gyi sdums byed pa de ni bsod nams mngab chad med pa gras
155a7('dul ba): pa gzhal du med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// gang 'ga' zhag gis spa dus bu bcar gtubs pa thog ma dang ma mar sbyor bar byed pa de bzhin du/ gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang nas bya
155a8('dul ba): nas 'thun par sum sa byed pa'i don pasad na mas mang po chad med pa grangs med pa gzhal du mad bskyed par 'gyur rozhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bathun du'o// dge slong dag 'on kyangangs gnas na
155b1('dul ba): 2sa shA sa bca ba \u0f7f/ gan na byung pa dgasangag ga na la dbyung ba gsal bar bya'o/ nas da / gnas la bshAms ma

155b3('dul ba): rims kyi mdun du thal mo sbyor te cig tsog por 'dug la 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan dugasal/ bdag gi gleng gzhi gang las 'jab krol dang / ma ra dru ba dang / rtsed pa dang / 
155b4('dul ba): bgra nas me pa/ lung thung 'am/ srung 'a nas bkyi ma/ gnas nas dkyang ba lags mna'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags sa zhes pakye ba bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags

155b7('dul ba): de la ba bzhin dang 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin byer bkyi'o zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par byer// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
155b8('dul ba): gsan du gsal/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / chud pa dang / 'gyen pa byung na 'di lta ste/ lhung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe 'am/ 
156a1('dul ba): gnas nas dbyung ba lags sa na'am/ gnas nas dag ba ma lags sa nas 'theb 'di ni lhur ba mabyung ba ma lags te lung ba byung ba lags shing / gnas nas
156a2('dul ba): dbyung ba ma lags te gnas nas dbyung ba lags la gnas snang ba gang lags pa yang chos dang 'thun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par me 'os pas byung ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong
156a3('dul ba): yode 'di zhes bkye ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gas bin/ gal de dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cer btsud na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dag 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'de zhes pa

156a5('dul ba): kanas nas byung ba med 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mang ngan/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas
156a6('dul ba): kru pa'i dge slong me ni zhes bgyi ba byin par 'dod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa dag ni gsungs sheg/ dge 'dun gyis pa cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gnas na

156a8('dul ba): las byas dag pang shes da 'du las ldan pa gsas babya// gang na sa kyi/ gnas pal ba shams la ga/ nyi 'du dris pam chen gis dge slo namapa la ya / 
156b1('dul ba): bskol/ dge 'dun thams cad chags shing 'ardzun par gyur pa dang shes bya ba nas thugs brtse ba can nas bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas so// de nas dge slong gcag

156b5('dul ba): ba 'di dge 'dun las dbyung po gsol nas dge 'dun gyis 'di dbyung ba'i drin las mdzad lags te dbyung ba'i phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di nas bgyi ba dge 'dun las 'thun par gas pa na/ 
156b6('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cer bzod na dag 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i phrin las ma dang lags pa'i dge slong ming ring zhes bgyi la 'jug pa stsol par mdzad do// 'di
156b7('dul ba): nagasol ba'o// las bya ba re/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ cha dang ldan pa de'i gleng ka ni gang las 'thab kro ba dang / mtshang 'dra ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'dil
156b8('dul ba): krung ba byung ngo'i'am zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun gyis pazod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dpung ba'i drin las mang de lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgying la 'thun pa sung lags pa
157a1('dul ba): 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gor ma bzhin du'o// dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i las byas zin pa gang yin pa de la dge 'dun gyis 'thun pa skye

157a7('dul ba): ge 'dun las 'thun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ gal te dag 'dun gyi dusel ba bcing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis 'thun bstsal ba'i da
157b1('dul ba): nishe sa kyi byal dge / 'dun rgyas 'thun pa'i gas byed rgyal pa yang // 'di dgasol// las bya bani/ dge bdun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsapa/ tshen ldan pa da phreng gzhen
158a1('dul ba): kye gzhi'i rdzo // ka shi gnas pa'i grong khye na// sde 'a khams kyis ni dngos po dang // tsam par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// las ma yin dang slang log pa'o//

158a5('dul ba): dang chos gos byos pa dang ldan/ chos gas zin pa dang ldan nas de lhung b.red dang chos gos khyer te mnyan yod gang na pa der rgyu zhing dang ste/ ma gyis rgyu zhing dong ba dang mnyan yod du phyin to// 
158a6('dul ba): sde rnam kyis kun tu spyong pa ni rgyal bu rgyal gyi tshal gyi drug sde gang yang rung bas stong bar mi 'jog pa yin pas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgron nyi dga' 'dug pa drag rgyang ring po khon nas ma na

158b1('dul ba): lags so// das smras pa/ slob dpa phyag 'tshal lo// des bsams pa/ the ma 'jigan zugs shig yin te/ slo dpon yang mi shes mkhan pa yang migs sa snyam nas rgan zhugs

159a1('dul ba): sde 'angoms zhes bya ba gnas te/ de la brten nas gnas pa'i grong byar gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams zhes bya ba nas/ zas la gtong bar byed de zhes bya ba'i bar

159a3('dul ba): byed du phyin pa dang / de rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas sde 'joms kyis mthong nas des bsams pa/ gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa 'di dag 'ong gis ngal sor bcu go ste/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams
159a4('dul ba): cad kyis bslabs par bya'i khyim rnams su bas la ni btang bar mi bya'o snyam nas/ des de rnams ngal sor bcug nas yo byed thams cad kyis bstabs kyi khyim rnams su zas la ni ma btang //

159b1('dul ba): shig gal te sngang 'ongs pa zhig lan na yang bdag cad yan pa/ yang na rgan pa yin yang bdag cag yin la/ 'on te mang du 'os bzhi ga yin na yang bdagacag yin na/ dge slong 'din

159b4('dul ba): tsogs ni mtshan na zhes bye ba bar gang ma bzhin 'o// gnas brtan dag nang na nyams par mgyur tam/ drug sngornams kyis me brjod pa skyes nas smras pa/ cang mi smra bar 'dug par bye ba gang yin pa des smrar sa

159b6('dul ba): sa pas pa/ bram zed nga khyim bdag rnams dad par bye ba ni dka' la/ mngad par 'gyur ba sprul/ gal te 'dugan gnas pa'i blong byed gyi bram zad nga khyim bdag nams dad pa ma yin pa skye ba 'gyur bas pang
159b7('dul ba): dam pa thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ des lhung bzad dang chos gos khyer te mnyan yod gang na bdar rgyu zhing song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba las mnyan yod du phyin pa dang de dge slong rnam
160a1('dul ba): kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sde 'joms 'ongs pa legs so rangs pa lags so// khyad nga mthong ba ni bdag cag dgar na 'ongs pa da ma yin na/ 
160a2('dul ba): ci'i phyir khyod la brten nas gnas pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba byed la/ dge slong glo bur ba yang dag lhags pa

160a5('dul ba): kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na deng phyin chad dge slong gis gleng ba ma byas/ dran par ma byas shing khas blangs pa med par can
